title: Great stay!
review: The rooms are spacious, comfortable beds and well appointed amenities. Check in- check out was swift, friendly and helpful staff. The hotel is at a fantastic location- 3-4 min leisurely walk to patong beach. Close enough to access the beach and Bangla road and far enough to avoid the crazy crowds. The location and convenience for all our day trips clinched it for us. Great price for the location and rooms.  Would definitely recommend!

title: PERFECT HOTEL
review: Dear carolinen2166,   Thank you very much for your kind compliment and recommendation. Our team prides ourselves on providing our leisure guests with everything that they need to enjoy a fruitful stay at Andaman Embrace Patong.   We really appreciate you noting that you felt we achieved that end and you really enjoyed our perfect location in Patong Beach area.   It was a pleasure welcoming you and we hope to serve as your home during your next trip to Phuket Island.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Best Holiday at Phuket with Embrace
review: the room was very clean  and very big, the reception staff very friendly and try to help me in all my requests!!  The positio of the hotel it's very close to center and to the beach too. Nearby can find many restorant and are it's very safe!I

title: Superb property
review: Dear Dario C,  It brings a big smile to our team's face to know that the level of hospitality we provided was the most memorable aspect of your stay.   While we certainly appreciate the value our resort's easy beach access, outstanding guestrooms and amenities bring to our special guests like you, all of that would be meaningless if we couldn't back it up with superb service.  Thank you very much and it would be our pleasure to host you again in the future.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Average stay. Not sure why it’s a 5*
review: We stayed at Andaman Embrace from 22/11 to 26/11/2019, it is an excellent Hotel. One of the best location in Phuket. The Reception staff Ms  Pang and Ms Yang were very helpful in a fast check in and offered a free upgrade of a deluxe room with balcony to us.  Full marks to Andaman Embrace for quality service.

title: Good hotel, bit out of the way
review: Stayed 8 nights. Hotel getting a bit tired. Had to move from Sea View to Balcony room, due to water leak. Staff excellent, could not fault them. In particular the trainees at breakfast. All 3 very attentive.

title: Great staf
review: Dear moorepark1656,   Thank you very much for allowing us to serve as your home during your time at Andaman Embrace Patong and what makes us happiest is reading that our team's hospitality shined and ready to do everything to let all guest enjoy at our resort.   We can't wait for your return and If we can do anything to help facilitate your next visit, please do feel free to contact us.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: 5-star experience
review: Great staf and great hotel at great spot, calm and nice but still near to everything. The staf are serviceminded and helpful. It is an old building but its charming an clean. I really recomend to try out.

title: Great hotel
review: Dear 217samij,   Thank you so much for taking the time to share us such a great reviews. We're glad you enjoyed your perfect stay with us at Andaman Embrace Patong.   We are here to do our very best to ensure every day is a wonderful stay and to make our guests feel right at home.  Please let us know if we can assist with anything in the future and look forward to hosting you again soon. Again, thank you for your kind recommendation.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Awesome stay
review: We are staying for 3D2N at Andaman Embrace Patong, and we are not regreting choosing this hotel for a very very quick holiday get away.   We were hours early from the check in time when we arrived, but we were lucky to get an early check in. We understand every hotels check in time policy, but the staff at the front desk were very generous to let you enjoy the room early IF ITS READY.. and bam, i guess it was our lucky day!!   Special shout out to front desk officer MS. FUN for her very warm welcome. She did her very best to comunicate with us and explained the things which we need to know during our stay.  There was some hiccups on the first day but they were very apologetic about it, and getting a fruit platter and late check out as a service recovery made you willing to…

title: Great holiday location
review: Fantastic hotel and services neat clean rooms all you need, close to beach and a walk to most places but far enough away from the noise. The staff are amazing and friendly. Our second time staying here and we will be back.   Thank you.

title: Great Hotel
review: Dear Dmlmk72,   It was a great pleasure welcoming you to Andaman Embrace Patong. We are so glad to know that our outstanding location, friendly staff and all facilities worked together to make your vacation enjoyable on this second visit.   Thank you very much for your kind support and we look forward to treating you to another outstanding Phuket Getaway soon.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Nice location
review: Staff are very nice and their Long Island ice tea is #1. Room service is same cost as going downstaors which means I literally had room service the whole time. I also liked the pool bar and being able to have a drink while being in the pool.

title: Andaman Embrace Hotel
review: Dear Alexis O,   At Andaman Embrace Patong, our goal is to impress all our guests so we're thrilled we succeeded with you. It's wonderful to hear that our friendly staff, room service and the pool bar helped make your visit special. Our amazing staff will also be proud you appreciated their commitment to service with a smile.   Thank you so much for the lovely review and we look forward to hosting you again during your next trip  in Phuket Island.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: great hotel nice staff
review: I have been in this hotel for 5 nights at the good view room , it was quiet and clean very good location and mini market and many shop and super markets are very near . Near to beach and you will have good vaction here .

title: Nice hotel
review: Very nice place to stay. Friendly staff. They provided us with baby cot when we asked without extra cost. They accepted our request to have a delayed check out for 2 hours as our flight was late, without extra charges.

title: 非常棒
review: Dear Krishna_singh1979,    Thank you very much for joining us and for taking a moment to share the exceptional experience that you and your lovely family enjoyed.   We're glad that everything from our wonderful place and superb services created a relaxing atmosphere. We hope that you will have another great time to relax with us again soon.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Birthday Getaway
review: Very good, Mr. birthday, gave the cake surprise, super accident, very good, recommended, the room is good, breakfast is OK, service is good.  intimate.  The room was very air-conditioned.Very close to the beach。Fun and  Pang  is  very  nice，good  job

title: Mr.ishaq
review: Dear Della8023,   Our team appreciates your lovely compliments on everything from out resort's unbeatable hospitality to our spacious accommodation. It was a great pleasure sharing our unique features with you and being part of your birthday celebration.   We can't wait to do so again upon your return.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M. .

title: Great place!
review: Warm welcoming front of house.  Staff friendly and helpfull with recommendations. Accommodating over all good experience... Comfortable rooms and neat. Away from hussle and bussle but close enough to amenities...

title: Amazing
review: The service of andaman embrace hotel was very nice.  They are very welcoming cordial. Very polite stuff . Service is great.  Stuffs were always happy and smile face . Very friendly environment. Very near to sea beach . Only a few mins walk . The room was beautiful and clean . Thanks to andaman embrace hotel and all the hotel stuff.

title: Phuket family visit
review: Dear Rocky_h_khan,   It is a great pleasure to know that your time in Patong beach was so enjoyable. We can't thank you enough for highlighting our resort's unique features.   We will be sure to relay your compliments to our team members, who we're sure will be ecstatic to know how excellent your experience was. Please join us again for more beach relaxation as soon as you can.   Thank you so much indeed.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Andaman embrace resort
review: Wonderful staff who were always warm, friendly and very accommodating to our needs. Rooms were clean and well kept, pool and bar facilities were a highlight. Great location not far from beach, restaurant and Bangla Rd but also quiet enough to relax and enjoy. Would highly recommend and would com back again! Thank for having us

title: One of the Best hotel in Patong.
review: Dear Sully186,   From all of us at Andaman Embrace Patong, thank you for making our home your Phuket destination. We were delighted by your compliments on our proximity to the beach and wonderful amenities.   It's great that you found the opportunity to enjoy both of those perks so fully. We can't wait to one day welcome you back to our resort, so please consider joining us again during your next Phuket getaway.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Kind stuff! Good Wi-fi
review: One of the finest hotel near patong beach. Everything was so-2 perfect.Staff is very cooperative & humble. Buffet breakfast is the value for money(many options for vegetarian and healthy too).Rooms are very neat & clean.Hotel is just 5 minutes walking distance to patong beach.Main attraction- Pool & Bar.I highly recommend this property

title: Environment and services is quite good.
review: High recommended for this hotel (Andaman Embrace Hotel at Patong), all the staff is so nicely and friendly. Walk to Patong beach is Only around 3-5min. Beside have 7eleven and Family Mart also, so convenient. Room service is 24hours and the prices are reasonable. breakfast is buffet style，many choices even fruit juice also.

title: The hotel is excellent
review: Dear Tuckwai C,   Thank you very much for taking the time and appreciate the kind words about the resort and the team members as you made their day.   Again, thank you for your kind recommendation and if anything we can assist in the future, please let us know.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Disappointed and overrated
review: The hotel upgrade us to the balcony for free. The swimming pool is very big. The breakfast is great .Good staffs to helping the customers as we enjoined it and we will sure to come back for check in here.

title: Visit was good everything was upto the mark
review: Dear Ofri010,   Providing our guests with unforgettable beach getaways is what we drive everything that we do at our Andaman Embrace Patong.   Reading that so many of our team members worded to uphold that standard of excellence is a delight. It would be a pleasure to treat you to more outstanding visits and please join us again soon.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Great location
review: Cons - Our room was facing a big construction site  - Run down hotel, tired pool, tired room, old furniture, weird smell - Swimming pool is smaller than it looks in the photos - Shower head is low, if you are tall, good luck  Pros - Quite central to shopping malls and attractions  I would only recommend this resort if you plan to be out most of the time. If you want to chill and relax go somewhere else.

title: Genuinely great people and service
review: Great hotel with nothing being a issue when requested. Breakfast was sensational every morning. Great location, walking distance to everything. Highly recommend visiting this hotel. Poolside is second to none. We will definitely be back. Thank you team once again.

title: Recommed
review: Dear Tolly90,   It is a great pleasure to know that your wonderful time in Patong Beach was so enjoyable. We can't thank you enough for highlighting our resort's unique features like breakfast, perfect location and stunning pool.   Please join us again for more beach relaxation as soon as you can.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Very Good Value
review: Nice breakfast, good service and cozy atmosphere. Able to see the sea from the room window. They also have bathtub, which is good. And I think the man behind the table is really handsome 我用中文凑50字  我用中文凑50字我用中文凑50字 我用中文凑50字我用中文凑50字我用中文凑50字我用中文凑50字我用中文凑50字我用中文凑50字

title: Wonderful trip
review: Dear HengjianZHANG,   Thank you so much for your recent stay with us at Andaman Embrace Patong. It was our pleasure to treat you to a wonderful breakfast experience and memorable overall visit.   Please join us again for another relaxing getaway just as soon as you can.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M. .

title: Memorable experience
review: Free upgrade and friendly staff.  Good value for money. Included nice buffet breakfast. 1 block from Beach.  Nice pool lots to do in Town.   Workout room pretty good for price point.  Parking free and room was clean

title: Thoughtful and family oriented hotel!!!
review: The hotel staff staff were amazing! They answered to our queries in a short brief of time.   Most importantly, it was my father in laws birthday. The staffs (Fun, Yong, Ton, Plam) bought a cake and prepared a small yet meaningful experience for us. It was very well planned and unexpected.   I would say thoughtful and definitely family friendly hotel! Would recommend for anyone who is coming for family holidays.

title: Hotel in a convenient location
review: Dear Vincentlcw,   Thank you very much for allowing our team to help make your father-in-law's birthday celebration special. It was a pleasure to have you all with us and we're elated to read that our hospitality from Ms. Fun, Ms. Yong, Mr. Ton & Mr. Palm and other memorable qualities struck a chord with you.   We welcome you to reach out to us at any time if we can be of assistance in planning your next Phuket getaway.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Patang beach
review: Stayed for 3 nights with a big group of friends.  The hotel is located in Patong to its many shops nearby and Jungceylon shopping mall about 15 min walk away.  The rooms are spacious and adequate but the bathrooms has only bathtubs which which will get the floor wet when bathing.  The bathtubs are quite high to climb in and it's definitely not suitable for elderly people as it can be slippery if not careful. Water pressure is low on the  lower floors so be sure to stay only from the 6th floor upwards.  The breakfast is only average without much varieties.

title: Courtesy of andaman embrace patang
review: Dear Jo S,   Thank you so much for making our pure leisure resort your Phuket vacation destination. While we trust that qualities like our outstanding location added to your wonderful experience, we do apologize for the inconveniences that you outlines.   We're glad to know that your concerns were addressed on-site and we will discuss your feedback internally to continue improving our guest experience. It was a pleasure to have you with us and we sincerely hope to one day have an opportunity to treat you to an improved stay.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Impression Hotel
review: Hotel is good  Swimming pool is also ok  Rooms are ok Food is also ok  Staff is ok Ambience is okay it’s clean  Parang beach is lovely place to once in life time, most visited place here is Main Street which is near by

title: Best hotel
review: We stayed @ the Andaman Embrace Patong hotel 👍👍 Excellent hotel, spotless ,very well maintained, beautiful spacious rooms, in the middle restaurants , shopping , 1 minute walking to the beach, amazing staff, it deserve more then * * * *  👍👍 must check this hotel before you book anywhere else.

title: Exceptional Stay
review: Dear Sam5112,   First and foremost, we can't thank you enough for joining us at Andaman Embrace Patong. It delights us to read that all outstanding facilities shined during your visit.   Please let us know if we can be of assistance when planning your next Phuket getaway.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Check in
review: Spent 3 days at this amazing hotel. Great location , amazing staff, especially Pang, she went out of the way to help us. We err upgraded, the rooms were very nice . Everything was high quality. Thank you Pang and everybody at the hotel.

title: Washroom quality is pathetic.
review: Dear 17amank,   Thank you so much for sharing that perfect facilities like our great location and spacious room with full amenities were standout qualities during your time with us.   It's also a pleasure to know that so much of our team members like Pang and all left an impression on you with their wonderful hospitality.   We hope that your overall excellent experience will inspire you to settle in with us again soon.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Good Atmosphere Polite Staff
review: We have just checked in to hotel. Now at the bar. We will be accessing the pool tomorrow and be checking out the local delicacies tonight. We have a complimentary welcome drink which was very welcoming.

title: Review
review: The hotel has a very nice view The breakfast was perfect We had a very good access to the beach and bangla road and jungceylon The staff were so friendly  I would definitely recommend you to come to this hotel and enjoy it

title: Very enjoyable,
review: Dear Sasanparvin,   We're glad to know that, even during your brief time with us, our hospitality shined brightly. We trust that your wonderful trip to Patong beach was outstanding and our team looks forward to welcoming you back during your next visit to Phuket Island.  Thank you so much indeed.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Fantastic hotel
review: Have had very pleasant and relaxing stay,Fun staff  have been very friendly, welcoming even a birthday surprise presented to me on return. Jay has looked after us with excellent service every evening. Amenities have been to expectations,clean and within walking distance to all that Patong offers.

title: Amazing hitel
review: Dear clement5654,   We are pleased to read that your stay left a lasting impression on your birthday celebration. It's always a treat when our guests take the time to let us know how much they've enjoyed so many of the qualities that make our resort special, from our Thai hospitality to our on-site service options.   Your kind words and feedback are appreciated and we look forward to taking care of you again next time you're in Patong Beach, Phuket Island.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Good hotel
review: My stay at Andaman embrace Patong was a great experience had the room with balcony view of the pool and ocean 🌊.. pool was great also with the swim up bar to order cocktails 🍹.. great friendly staff also breakfast was also great 👍

title: Great hotel
review: I arrived at hotel to very friendly efficient reception staff....the staff checked the bookings and upgraded us to beautiful room...the facilities were all well maintained, lovely big swimming pool and boutique gym..the breakfast and room service very good...on checkout given extra hour with no fuss...good experience

title: Holiday stay
review: Dear John H,  We were glad to welcome you to our pure leisure resort for your great holidays. In reading about your visit, it's clear that elements of your stay met all expectations. Your feedback helps us to continue refining our guest experience and it would be a pleasure to treat you to a more streamlined stay during your next visit to Patong Beach area.   Thank you so much indeed.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: honey moon stay at Andman Embrace Patong
review: Excellent customer service with free upgrade!  Free welcome drink and towel at check in, Nice welcoming smile with excellent English speaking skills.  Very happy with their service and heart warming customer service.

title: 5 stars hotel to stay in Phuket
review: Dear kazuaki77,   It was our great pleasure to make you feel like a special guest during your recent visit to our Andaman Embrace Patong resort. We're glad to hear that you were able to recharge and our team can't wait to take exceptional care of you again the next time you're in need of relaxation.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Good hotel
review: hello, it was a lovely stay. A warm reception. an extreamy good service!  good location near to touristic places like beach and bangla street with restaurants and night clubs !!!!! so nice so good   i really recommand it.

title: Honeymoon
review: Fantastic hotel! Great location, close to bangla road, shopping centre and patong beach. Staff are all extremely helpful, kind and accomodating of individual needs. Changed room to allow us to get a bathtub which was much appreciated. Food is delicious and cocktails even better. Rooms were cleaned to a high standard, would definitely recommend and return in the future. Thank u Andaman Embrace

title: Great place to stay
review: Dear Ailie V,   It brings a big smile to our face to know that everything from our Thai hospitality to our Patong Beach location made your time in Phuket so memorable.   Please consider joining us again soon to enjoy more of what we have to offer. Thank you so much indeed.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Recommended strongly, love it
review: Great place to stay, very close to a lot of sightseeing locations. There are two big shopping mall nearby that can purchase local and international goods and if you are interested in seafood, there are planty of seafood nearby.

title: Very good stay
review: Dear sana s,   Knowing that our Andaman Embrace Patong resort treated you to a wonderful stay in Phuket brings a huge smile to our face.   Thank you so much for sharing your compliments and for feelings comfortable letting you and your family know about the experience that we provide here. We look forward to welcoming you again soon.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Good hotel
review: Hotel was nice, location super, room clean and nice. Staff speaking english well, specially we liked Fun, Ton, Toey, Tui always helping and really kind. Breakfast selection really great, we enjoyed so much. So recommended strongly, thanks.

title: Honeymoon trip
review: Check in was smooth.. We were assisted by Ms Ko. We were given cold towel and welcome drink upon check in. Its was refreshing! Our room was nicely decorated. Staff were friendly and nice.Overall, service was satisfastion.

title: Good hotel
review: Dear AbdulRahimSapari,   It was our pleasure to provide you and your wife with the relaxing honeymoon trip that you both deserved.   Thank you, from all of us, for choosing our pure leisure resort in Patong Beach and please join us again the moment that you find more rest and relaxation to be in order.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Nice hotel
review: Good hotel management is too good everything is near by hotel hotel buffet is also good stay here 3 days hotel near the beach staff very friendly . Room very nice clean. I will come back again next time. I love phuket

title: Good
review: Dear Himanshuarora0032,   Thank you very much for taking your valuable time to share us the wonderful review and glad you enjoyed your recent stay with us at Andaman Embrace Patong.   We are here to do our very best to insure every stay is a perfect stay and to make our guests feel right at home. Please let us know if we can assist with anything in the future and look forward to welcoming you back soon.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Good to stay for the location
review: A nice hotel very close to the beach and patong centre. Have a nice pool as well. The staff is very helping and the rooms are fine. I like the hotel in overall. I recommend it especially for families.

title: Perfect Hotel and Staff
review: We recently visited Phuket at this hotel and found this place to be an ideal place to stay.  The rooms are clean and the breakfast is awesome.   The staff member Ms. Waan helped us with a graceful smile and made our stay a memorable stay.

title: birthday holiday in phuket
review: Dear Dreamer480640,   It was our pleasure to accommodate your recent stay and we're thrilled that our cozy room impressed you with the wonderful breakfast.  Our team works hard to offer exceptional customer service, and we know that Ms. Wan will appreciate you highlighting her efforts.   Your comfort is our pleasure, and we look forward to hosting you again the next time you're in Patong Beach area.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Central Location-Affordable Hotel
review: we spent our 5 days in andaman embarace, and i would like to commend all the staffs for their efficiency and reliability. they even prepare a birthday cake for me and we are so surprised when we entered our room and the cake was there, it was so sweet and touching. thank you so much. restaurant food is a must to try too. will be back again.

title: Awesome friendly staff and great hotel location
review: Dear missybeng,   Thank you so much for choosing us here at Andaman Embrace Patong, Phuket and we are so thrilled to see that you enjoyed your accommodation and allowed us to be a part of your birthday celebration this wonderful time.   We pride ourselves in excelling in all areas and it is great to receive your perfect praise. We all eagerly await your return and we hope you have a great trip home.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Awesome hotel
review: The plus point of this hotel is definitely its central location as the beach as well as the shopping/entertainment district are within walking distance. and there are many shops around the vicinity as well hence you really dont need to go far to get anything. the hotel obviously an old refurbished hotel and the refurbishments are not of the best quality however they do serve they purposes. plenty of parking spaces and the room is spacious. breakfast was mediocre at best so much so that we just skipped the next day's breakfast though we have paid for it. i may consider this hotel if i dont intend to spend much time in room and just need something centrally located.staffs were friendly though which was a plus point

title: Mr Tickner
review: Andaman hotel has great friendly staff and a central location a short walk to the beach and Bangla rd and close to everything.the rooms were clean and fresh I enjoyed the 24 hour room  service as well as the emenities and restaurant. If traveling alone the hotel is geust friendly but there is a fee .

title: Warm and friendly hotel, in the heart of the main area
review: Dear StevenTickner,   Thank you so much for sharing your wonderful feedback. We're glad that so many of the qualities that make our resort special worked together to make your vacation enjoyable.   Nothing would make us happier than to treat you to another beach vacation, so please come and visit us again during your next Phuket Getaway.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Andaman Embrace Patong
review: We are pleased with the hotel location. It's close to the market and beach. Also has many restaurants and party places around.. the hotel is clean and pleasant. Would certainly recommend for your trip..

title: Outstanding
review: Dear Tarvadi,  We're glad to know that our pure leisure resort provided you with everything needed to enjoy a comfortable and productive stay.   Thank you so much for sharing your kind words and please know that we're standing by if you should need any assistance making arrangements for your next visit or leisure getaway.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Thai at Leisure
review: Such an amazing hotel. We arrived late at night. Greeted with smiles and easy check in. We were upgraded to Deluxe Balcony Suite for my birthday.  Thank you so much Jay  Buffet breakfast was delicious. Swimming pool and swim up bar was fantastic.  Noo from the pool bar made awesome cocktails. Location was superb - close to the beach and restaurants. Cannot fault this hotel in any way. I will definitely return with my family. Thank you so much for making my birthday a memorable one.

title: Good
review: The property is very close to the patong area. So this property would be a good choice if you want to hang out a lot in the beach . There are nice shopping areas and the famous mall and Bangala road is walkable distance form here.

title: Andaman Embrace Patong
review: Dear 0001ramyaa,   It is a great pleasure to know that your special time in Patong Beach, Phuket Island was so enjoyable. We can't thank you enough for highlighting our resort's unique features.   We will be sure to relay your compliments to our team members to know how excellent your experience was.   Thank you very much and please be our guest again for more beach relaxation as soon as you can.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Great Hotel
review: Very good hotel, staff is very friendly. The room is very clean and the service is top class! They are at your service day and night and are willing to help you at any time you want. Very good locating close to the beach.

title: Best Birthday Experience
review: Dear Jim B,  Our team is delighted to read that you enjoyed such a wonderful experience at our pure leisure resort. Thank you so much for letting us know how much you appreciated all of the details that made your stay special.  It was an absolute pleasurer welcoming you to Andaman Embrace Patong and we look forward to providing you with another exceptional Patong Beach Getaway so soon.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Smooth checin
review: We stayed here for 2 weeks and absolutely loved the hotel. All the staff are really helpful and friendly. The hotel is in an excellent location to the beach and all shops within a 10 minute walking distance. Special thanks to Noo, Nuk and Torn at the pool bar for making us feel welcome everyday.

title: Awesome Place
review: Retreat in the Electrifying Neighbourhood of Patong Blending contemporary elements with the vibrant colours and cultures of Patong, Hotel Andeman Embrace, Phuket Patong is a stand-out hotel nestled nearby the beach, shops and entertainment hotspots. Located.The rooms are completed with plush bedding and a spa-inspired bathroom, while you'll be able to stay connected to your loved ones and relax .We specially thanks to Ms.WAN,MsFUN and Mr.TUI for there extremely accomodating nature.At Home feeling...

title: Excellent
review: Dear Narpinder123456,   We are very happy to have provided you with the perfect backdrop for your memorable vacation. Whether it's to stay connected with your beloved one or it's simply to enjoy beach resort relaxation on your own, our team cannot wait for your next visit to join us like your home away from home again.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Great Hotel!
review: Great service by the staff members Awesome location Very near to the market Very near to the beach Good food Neat and clean service in rooms Seems like newly built hotel with all modernised equipments. Spacious rooms You'll be stay connected with your loved ones back home with complimentary Wi-Fi.

title: Very good hotel
review: Dear Harpreet K,   It is a great pleasure to hear that our team was able to treat you and your family to such an incredible experience. We love to know that our resort facilities and perfect location can make a wonderful thing in the busy Patong area.   Thank you very much for sharing your kind words and constructive feedback. We'd be delighted to treat you to another outstanding Patong Getaway so soon.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Great hotel
review: We love this hotel, we came here 5 years ago when we visited Phuket and didn’t hesitate to come back! The staff are the best, very friendly and welcoming, particularly the guys around the pool and bar. The food is nice and the proximity to the centre of all the shops and restaurants is perfect. 10 mins walk to Bangla Road and 2 mins walk to the beach. Would definitely stay here again! Thank you to everyone :)

title: Awesome Hotel
review: Perfectly located away from the madness of Patong Beach nightlife. A very short walk in. No noise is heard overnight. The hotel itself is beautiful both the rooms and the grounds. The staff are very attentive to your needs.   You are welcomed with a nice fruity drink.   If you go to Patong this hotel is recommended. It had a lovely tropical feel about it. Following facility available  Internet – Free WiFi Entertainment – 32-inch LCD TV with satellite channels Food & Drink – Fridge, minibar, coffee/tea maker and 24-hour room service Sleep – Premium bedding and blackout drapes/curtains Bathroom – Private bathroom, bathrobes and a shower/bathtub combination with a rainfall showerhead Practical – Safe, desk and phone; rollaway/extra beds and free cots/infant beds available on…

title: Perfect for family stay!
review: Dear Sanjay M,  Thank you so much for taking the time and the nice reviews. We're glad you enjoyed your perfect stay with us at Andaman Embrace Patong.   We are here to do our very best to insure every stay is a wonderful stay and to make our guests feel right at home. Please let us know if we can assist with anything in the future and look forward to welcoming you back soon.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Awesome stay
review: Very nice hotel, with friendly staff. Patong beach is only 5 -10 minutes walk.... x Lot of family friendly marts, Indian restaurants nearby.....  We stayed for 4 days, had a pleasant time. Planning to visit again next year.

title: HIGHLY RECOMMEND
review: Dear KoneriSK,   Thank you very much for choosing to stay with us at Andaman Embrace Patong and glad you enjoyed our hotel's room, facilities, the quality of the service and the perfect location. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back and redeem ourselves on your next visit.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Highly recommended
review: Deluxe room no balcony, did not need a balcony. Spent time lazing around pool. Room exceptionally clean and standard maintained for entire 7day stay, could not fault. Bed a bit hard but standard in Asian countries. Slept on much worse. Staff attended to all requests without a problem, even moving us to a shower only room when the bath arrangement did not suit. Organised transport for us and gave advice on prices we should be paying. All staff so awesome and all smiling.  Included breakfast good and fresh food. Made to order omelettes every morning, thanks Ben. Staff always keen to help with everything. Great pool to laze around and drink cocktails. Spent two days doing just that. Good happy hours and good food in Sino bar.  Great location, walking distance to beach, heaps…

title: Excellent stay so far
review: We are hving a wonderful time at Andaman Embrace Patong..with all the cheerful caring n smiling staff. When they realised tat i was injured..the changed n upgraded me so tat i can use the facilities with ease..I hurt my hip in a fall. Thank you very much once again for your kind n considerate attention to my needs. U sure did go beyond ur expectations...KUDOS

title: Affordable price to stay
review: Dear Patrick G,   Thank you very much for visiting us at Andaman Embrace Patong. It is a great pleasure to know that everything from our spacious Balcony Deluxe room to our outstanding hospitality made your stay wonderful.   We loved helping make your Patong Beach vacation a memorable one and look forward to providing you with more unforgettable experiences for years to come.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Accommodative
review: Front desk Wan is very accomodating and friendly. Clean room and the property is near everywhere. Definitely will come back and highly recommeded. Breakfast is good. The view is fantastic. Rome front desk is cery helpful and polite. A place to stay with the family.

title: Very good service
review: Dear Hazeljacobneil,   Thank you so much for taking the time and the wonderful review. Ms. Wan, Mr. Rome and all of us  are here to do our very best to insure every stay is a perfect stay and to make our guests feel right at home.  Please let us know if we can assist you with anything in the future and looking forward to welcome you back soon.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Phuket splendid stay
review: Hotel was accommodating to provide late check out since our flight is later in the evening. Free parking was provided. Location is good as it is surrounded by eateries. Surrounding is vibrant and happening.

title: Great location with reasonable price
review: The front desk has been incredibly nice and helpful and was very helpful in advice on what to do in the city. Parking is adequate. Hotel was very clean as well as the room. The breakfast was better than what I expected.  Though we didn't spend too much time in the hotel, other than sleeping but it left a great impression on us! Our sheets, towels and surfaces of desk, counter and bathroom were all regularly cleaned during our stay.  The hotel is across from Novotel Hotel for half the price. The location is good within 5 minutes walk from the beach. Holiday Inn Express is next door. The room is spacious. The water is not enough hot for shower. The breakfast is good. The resort was nice and the pool is fantastic. Personally, Phuket  is a nice tourist teapot but the hotel is a nice…

title: Warm Stay Andaman Embrace
review: Dear mjchaw,  We always love welcoming all guests to our pure leisure resort in Patong beach area and are elated to read that you had such a wonderful time with us.   Thank you very much for sharing your compliments on everything from our hospitality to our spacious room, perfect location and beyond. The next time you're craving a getaway, please let us know so we can treat you to another exceptionally relaxing visit.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Excellent  experience
review: Staff is generous and helpful, allow room upgrade at no extra cost. Looking forward to visit again. Resort ambience is awesome, clean and spacious. One must try this place for a family holidays, superb location.

title: Wow stay
review: Dear Amit2976,   We're so glad to know that our resort provided you with everything needed to enjoy a comfortable and productive stay.   Thank you so much for sharing your kind words and please know that we're standing by if you could need any assistance making arrangements for your next holidays in Patong area.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Beautiful and warm ambiance
review: Feels comfortable and they help us if theirs any problem ...everyone is very nice , good staff ..food is nice ..do room accommodations  is good . Bathroom is clean , swimming  is good , nice reception  area , tasty foods & drinks

title: Good hotel wonderful staff
review: We stayed in andaman Embrace hotel at patong Beach  and its really wonderful place... Very polite and welcoming staff... They upgraded the room too...will stay again  when I visit pataya again. Sanjeev jain.

title: Excellent hospitality
review: Dear Sanjeevnoni,   Thank you so much for taking the time and the nice review. We are here to do our very best to insure every stay is a perfect stay and to make our guests feel right at home.  Please let us know if we can assist you with anything in the future and looking forward to welcome you back soon.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Andaman embrace
review: Very good hotel and faculties.  Good open space in front of hotel. Nice staff. Good lobby. They provide welcome drink, which I think is made of coconut  drink.Rooms are good. Location is also very near to beach  road

title: Family Vacation
review: Dear Shailesh J,   We loved welcoming you to Andaman Embrace Patong and are pleased t o read that you had a great time at our pure leisure resort.   All of us here would like to thank you for taking a moment to share your praise and we'd like you to know that we look forward to providing you with another exceptional stay during your next vacation in the Patong area.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Great place to stay
review: This is such a  good hotel. Por and Fun are the best staff.  The hotel has a great spread for breakfast and a nice pool   The beach is 2 minutes walking with all the fun places around. I will stay at this hotel again

title: Perfect
review: Very nice hotel. The staff is very friendly and helpful.  The pool is very large and you can order, food and drink directly at the pool bar.  Rooms are clean and comfortable.   Would definitely recommend the hotel.

title: Perfect five star hotel great service and value for your money
review: Dear FreedomAP,   We really appreciate you sharing your great comments. Our team at Andaman Embrace Patong loved welcoming you and we hope that your overall time with us was enjoyable.  During your next visit, talk to any of our team members about joining if you're interested and they will be happy to walk you through the steps should you need assistance. Thank you very much for staying with us and your high recommendation.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Comfortable stay
review: This staff  is extremely friendly and very well teached.  For every issue there was a prompt solution.  Wi-Fi works very fast the pool is clean and there’s even a pool bar where you can drink and eat while sitting in the pool.  Me and my friends will definitely come again.

title: Good holiday great staff
review: Dear Koenig_andreas,   To be counted among the wonderful experiences that you've enjoyed at Andaman Embrace Patong is an absolute honor. We thank you so much for spending the holiday with us and for allowing our team the opportunity to provide you with an memorable time.   Your kind words mean the world to us and we would like you to know that we're always available, should you need any help planning your next trip to Patong Beach, Phuket Island.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Awesome vocation
review: The rooms were neat and clean, the staff was very cooperative and hospitable. It means a lot of be greeted by smiling faces and a positive attitude when u are on a vacation. Our stay here was memorable.

title: Very nice
review: Good service nice location,so the staffs in the hotel were helpful and always take care the guests.The envelonment was so nice and beautiful location anyway I will recommend my friends to stay here.Big good.

title: Clean & crisp
review: Dear 455685447,   Providing our guests with outstanding hospitality is always a top priority at Andaman Embrace Patong. We are glad to know that our team members upheld that standard wonderfully during your stay.   We look forward to taking outstanding care of you again during your next trip to Phuket Island and thank you so much for your kind recommendation.  Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Excellent location and service
review: Great service. Friendly and accommodating. Rooms were clean, crisp and modern. The fabulous air conditioning was great to beat the heat. Yummy breakfast variety. Surrounds were great including awesome swim up bar pool. Very happy with the stay.

title: Great Birthday Celebration
review: Dear NCarter76,  We are delighted to read that you enjoyed such a relaxing experience at our pure leisure resort. Thank you so much for letting us know how much you appreciated all of the small details that made your stay amazing. It was an absolute pleasure welcoming you to the resort and we look forward to providing you with another exceptional Patong Holiday soon.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Great Stay At Andaman Embrace
review: Near the sea, great location.  A bit older but very comfortable, AC cold and internet fast.  Bed comfortable and service great.   We have restaurants nearby and daily buffet breakfast.   The pool is beautiful too.   Local travel agency books tour great rate and discounted as well.

title: Worth the stay
review: We have stayed for 3 nights and can’t complain on anything it is one of the best hotels patong has to offer they have a good pool and has almost whole day of happy hours it’s worth getting into pool and get served by pool side bar and when we want to check out we asked for the late check out and nothing is a problem for them they just did it which is great and forgot to mention that they have upgraded us on day one to a superior room everything is just fine

title: Excellent accommodation ,awesome service and amazingly supportive staff
review: Dear karthiks156,   Thank you so much for the great review and sharing your wonderful experience at Andaman Embrace Patong, Phuket. It is our absolute pleasure to have the opportunity to welcome you back again hopefully soon.   If there is anything we can assist with in the future, please let us know and look forward to have you with us soon.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Best hotel in patong,phuket
review: I spent 3 nights at Andaman Embrace Resort and spa,  it was amazing experience, the staff was very supportive and hospitable,  I enjoyed every moment at the resort and would recommend people to experience it at least once.

title: Bestest place to stay in paying (Phuket)
review: Dear Preet12356,  We would like to thank you for taking the time to let us know how much our team's hospitality impressed you during your Phuket visit. The staff you've mentioned are absolute all-stars and we will be sure to let all of them know that you agree with that sentiment.   Thank you very much for all of your praise and please join us again the next time you find yourself craving an unforgettable beach vacation.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Best stay ever
review: Good facilities, awesome service & tasty food ,my kids were enjoying a lot in swimming pool and in the play zone.good infrastructur ,and services were good. It was fantastic here thanks for everything.

title: Worst Experience In 25 years of trvalling
review: Rooms were booked and paid a fortnight ago for a group of 5 families travelling together.  Joined reaching this hotel , the front office staff started demanding 100 USD extra as deposit for each room. After frantically denying the random demand they settled for USD 100 for the entire group. They were not ready to take either Thai Bhat or credit card swipe.  I have not see this kindnof behaviour in my entire 25 years of travelling worldwide.  They even refused to identify and mark luggages at the lobby and pushed the entire luggage unsorted  in front of the rooms ,leaving our hapless group to retrieve the luggage from far cornea of room.  Over all an avoid.  Unprofessional hotel.  Many better run hotels you will find here in Phuket.

title: Good location & staff
review: Dear buthup,  Thank you for sharing your travel experiences with us. While we're glad that you enjoyed your family time at our resort but we are sorry to hear that other aspects of your stay did not meet your expectations.   Please accept our apologies for any inconvenience caused by asking the deposit upon check in. This is just the hotel standard practice, In the travel industry today, most of the hotels require whether a cash deposit or credit card. In this situation, the hotel charges a refundable deposit in case to cover any unexpected charges like room service, spa or other consumptions and if nothing is charged to the room then the deposit will return to the guest upon check out.   Our aim is always to provide guests with the perfect combination of relaxation and fun like others. We appreciate your understanding in this matter and look forward to welcoming you back to our resort in the future and better achieve that goal.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Excellent customer service
review: went on a family holiday for a week. Good spot In Patong, close to night life and restaurants & very kind, accommodating & helpful staff especially Fun & Ploy at reception. Very helpful travel guides in planning day trips

title: Family trip
review: Dear elobrien98,   We're so glad that Ms. Fun & Ms. Ploy and the rest of our team's welcoming hospitality made your Phuket experience one to remember. If you ever find yourself in need of assistance when booking your next vacation to the area, please let us know.   Thank you very much and have a wonderful day.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Awesome stay and good service
review: Staff at the hotel sooo helpful with anything we requested!! Nothing was too much trouble.  Happy smiles and great attitudes.  Swim up bar is fantastic, happy hour so cheap.  Thanks Beau & Wan see you when we visit again next year :).

title: Very good
review: Nice hotel, it's a very beautiful place near Patong beach and the reception staffs very friendly.  Good location for shopping or trying other bars.  Lovely. I will be back again next time. Thank you guys.

title: Holiday
review: Dear Sairung S,  It is so generous of you to have taken the time to not only share your wonderful feedback but to compliment our great team members that made your vacation extra-special.   We will be sure to personally share your praise with everyone in the team. Please join us again for another exceedingly relaxing stay.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Hotel stay
review: Staff,location perfect. Hotel and cleanliness 10 out of 10. Definitely  stay there again and pool bar a must.. ideal for couples or people with a young family. Close to the beach about a 10 minute walk. Good location for shopping or trying other bars. Bangla road is probably a 10 or 15 minute walk or 200 baht in a tuk tuk. Well happy.

title: Good location
review: Dear steve a,   Thank you so much for sharing your great review. We are very happy to read that your goal of finding a comfortable place to rest and relax in Patong area was fully met during your visit to Andaman Embrace Patong.   Your compliments regarding the hotel cleanliness, amazing pool bar, perfect location and your interaction with our friendly team that you enjoyed are appreciated.   We look forward to welcoming you back here again soon.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Seamless srat
review: Stayed 8 nights  Staff happy very helpful friendly  Always greeted with good morning good night Room clean great working air con cleaned daily Food yum plenty to choose Pool beautiful  10mins walk from Bangla Would stay again

title: Leisure time
review: The hotel is in an excellent locatio a block from a beautiful beach that has all the activities an amenities you could wish for.  Hotel staff was very friendly, accomodating and efficient.  Minor problem with room light was fixed in minutes.  Food including room service was good.  Lots of shopping and restraurants nearby.

title: Great location
review: Dear Jaybee112233,   It was such a great pleasure to be part of your wonderful leisure time. We are pleased to read your positive comment that, overall, you enjoyed a memorable experience filled with fun, friendly hospitality and so much more.   We will be sure to share your praise with each of the department's that you've mentioned and will also discuss your constructive feedback internally.   Thank you very much and we look forward to providing you with more unforgettable experience so soon.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Nice hotel and great location
review: I am really impressed by the location and services of this hotel. Food is also great. I will be recommending this place to all my friends they offer great deals on day tours as well. Great rooms with nice view.

title: Realite Nice staff and great hôtel
review: Dear Rita K,  We can only imagine how much fun you had with Andaman Embrace Patong and thank you so much for allowing us to be a part of your wonderful experience.   Your great compliments were an absolute treat to read and we'll be sure to personally share them with our great team.   Again, thank you for your kind recommendation to all your lovely friends and we look forward to welcoming you back to our pure leisure resort soon.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Awesome room
review: This hotel has all you need, great location, nice pool with pool bar. The staff was very welcoming. Good room size, clean and room whit no noice Aircon. Give it a try if you visit phuket. I am sure you will enjoy this hotel.

title: Perfect location
review: The location of the hotel is just perfect. Near to the beach, in  the middle of patong and walking distance to the halal restaurants! You can also just walk to the Patong night markets! Perfect for us.

title: Great Time
review: Dear norafiqamokhtar,   Your compliments regarding the perfect hotel location in the central of Patong Beach and easy access to all tourist attraction were an absolute treat to read.   Thank you for sharing your praise and we can not wait to help you create more special memories upon your return to the Patong area.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Excellent service. Reception staff very helpful
review: V,very good,like it very much, the room is tidy, the service is very good, very friendly, I really want to stay for a few more nights, I hope I can bring the whole family in the future.  The breakfast is very rich, with bread, eggs, barbecue, meat rolls, perfume pineapple, watermelon, papaya milk, seafood porridge, onion soup, bacon, coffee, and soothing music and birds flying freely.  The pool is also very clean, very beautiful, comfortable living here is the happiest thing, there is free mineral water every day, on-call room service!  !  !

title: Corporate incentive leisure group.
review: Dear zhaoying3333,   Thank you very much for staying with us at Andaman Embrace Patong and thank you for your wonderful review.   We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and we are especially happy to hear that our team delivered friendly, helpful and attentive service during your visit. Their commitment to take initiative with selfless sincerity and thoughtful courtesy has allowed them to fully recognize the needs of our guests.   Please do recommend us to your lovely family and friends and we look forward to welcoming you back whenever you plan your next visit to Patong Beach, Phuket Island with the whole family. If I may be of further assistance, please do contact me directly via dosm@AndamanEmbrace.com, my team and I remain at your service.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Workation
review: Great holiday, close to the beach and the night life. Excellent rexeption here very friendly and kind. Hotel kept very clean and presentable. Roundthe clock food service is quick and really good.Pool and pool bar have great service as well.

title: Wow
review: Good staying hotel and easy to travel around to beach.  Execellent services And good hospitality.  The front desk staff are very helpful and guide and explains freely.  Food at restaurant is nice and taste with beautiful pool around the cirner to relax.  More guest friendly attitude

title: Very Poor Service !
review: Dear  Thank you very much for taking the time to write us a Wow 5 star review. We are so pleased you enjoyed your recent stay with us and really appreciated the unique Thai hospitality experience we had to offer.   We look forward to welcoming you again and hosting you in the future.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Excellent resort nice and close to everything.
review: I booked for one night only just to celebrate our anniversary and to my boyfriend’s birthday today, and to surprise him for tonight. I came to the lobby very wet and cold because of the festival here and the staff from reception not even care at all if you are freezing, not even saying sawasdee kha or any greetings at all, not even served welcome drink etc.   The room was not ready at 2 pm and after 2 pm they will say to you that the room is ready but there are engineers to fix the light??? When I came to the room they gave me a room with 2 beds even I already spoke to the lady before my arrival date that this is for anniversary and birthday celebration And I spoke the Ms Wan to address this but she responded me that they are full and they could not provide my original room…

title: Coule
review: Dear I4328DXcindyb,   Thank you for sharing your experience with us. While we're glad that you selected our pure leisure resort just one night to celebrate your anniversary and birthday but sorry to hear that all aspects of your stay did not meet your expectations during peak demand in Songkarn Holidays comparing with the price and location in Patong area as you know very well.   Please accept our apologies for any inconvenience caused by the event that took place during your visit.  We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back in the future and better achieve that goal.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Good services and good view
review: Lovely stay at the anderman resort. Food and service excellect. Pool beautiful. Room service of an excellent standard. Would highly recommend this resort. Staff very friendly and helpful.Noo makes the best cocktails by the pool.

title: Amazing stay
review: We really enjoyed our stay at the Andaman Embrace resort! When we arrived to the hotel we were offered welcome drinks by very friendly staff! The location of the hotel is in the heart of Patong close to the beach, Soi Bangla night life and Jungeceylon shopping center. We stayed at the 6th floor our room was super clean and had an amazing pool and sea view! The restaurant offers a verity of Thai and international cuisine. I highly recommend this hotel to everyone especially families! Thank you Andaman Embrace resort for a wonderful experience.

title: Good hotel
review: Dear Takoua F,  Our team would like to thank you for being so kind to our resort and highly recommendation to the readers here. We are glad to read that we've not only held up the standard over the years but that we continue to improve upon it. It's always our greatest pleasure to welcome you to Andaman Embrace Patong and we can't wait to provide you with another unforgettable experience in the neat future.  Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Good hotel
review: I stayed at this hotel as the price was good and the location was good good swimming pools good food lots of beds some were in the water big tv to watch the football also nice vitrine my room I can see the sea ok

title: Fine location with grumpy personnel
review: Dear Coremma5,  We are glad to know that so much of what makes our resort special helped to make your wonderful trip to Patong Beach unforgettable.   Your compliments on our hotel's facilities, especially our stunning swimming pool, convenient location and hospitality are greatly appreciated.   We look forward to treating you to another exceptional stay next visit you find yourself in the area.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Great hotel
review: The hotel has a good location and the staff is so nice. It is so near to the beach and party area. Everithing is near and the taxi service is also good. They also have a good breakfast . They are so nice.

title: Very nice hotel
review: The room was clean and spacious and the room service was great. The location of this hotel makes it perfect for tourists to explore Phuket as famous places such as Jungceylon and Patong beach were all located within walkinh distance! The breakfast food had varieties of menus which changed daily. All of the menus were delicious!!

title: Good place to stay
review: Dear Oh C,  Thank you so much for sharing such a nice review. It's always a treat to learn that our guest's overall experience with us was enjoyable. We are glad that you got good use out of our spacious guestroom, all hotel facilities with perfect location in Patong and had the opportunity to enjoy our breakfast menus.   It was our pleasure to help provide you with a memorable vacation and we hope to welcome you back again soon.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Andaman hotel Patong Phuket
review: The location was nice as it was only 10 mins away from Jungcylon. The room condition was nice and was big. Highly recommend this hotel for young couples who like to stay at a pool resort but do not want a noisy environment. Breakfast was good as well. This review system needs to be fixed.

title: Birthday Dinner
review: Dear hyunjoonc548,  We are very pleased to know that our spacious guestroom, well breakfast and excellent location stood out to you during your holiday. It would be our pleasure to take excellent care of you again and we invite you to contact us if you need any help planning your return.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Cooking class
review: If you’re about to visit Phuket and want to be close to all of the amenities and action which Patong has to offer but still wish to b e able to retreat to a quiet comfortable haven look no further than the Andaman Embrace Hotel. It is situated close to the beach shops bars restaurants etc but is just on the outer edge of the “hectic zone”! This means you can simply walk to the action and retreat to the comfort of this hotel and relax with ease Rooms are spacious.  AC is well maintained. Restaurant pool and facilities excellent. Then there are the staff. Typically Thai.  Polite and helpful and happy Would i stay here again? Most certainly And a special mention to our local Dawson and Sanderson office who arranges our bookings. Thanks Norma

title: Holiday
review: Had a pleasant and comfortable stay. Location of the hotel is very good. Close to the beach, restaurantsand shopping. Room was very clean with large sea view balcony. Staff were very friendly and helpful.

title: Hoonemoon
review: Dear ckj08,  We are very pleased to read that our team's hospitality and attention to detail shined during your wonderful time with us. It was our pleasure to provide you with an unforgettable experience and we look forward to treating you to another outstanding stay in the future.  Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Family trip
review: It's our first time to visit patong and that's was the perfect choice .. the hotel is very clean .. the front desk was friendly .. delicious breakfast..go for the deluxe balcony room it's really worth it

title: SUPER Resort Hotel, the BEST hotel in PHUKET
review: Dear mostafa e,  We are pleased to know that our team's attention to detail and our Balcony Deluxe room created a wonderful memorable experience for your first honeymoon trip to Patong Beach area.   It was great having you with us and we look forward to seeing you again next anniversary you're looking to enjoy relaxation and have a great time in Phuket Island.    Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Honemoon
review: The staffs there were really nice and friendly here.  The room was okey with nice mountain view .The shower was broken and the water was hot and cold in every second . We told the receptionist next day ,and they fixed it straight away .  My son loved the swimming pool even it’s a bit deep even for the adult .  The breakfast was nice with many options ,but it’s almost the same thing everyday .  Everything is good besides the bathroom

title: honeymoon
review: This was the 1st time i visited to the hotel, and i got the best service from here. Friendly and greeting with smile every time we meet. Clear instructions about the service and great customer service from all the staffs of the hotel.

title: Memorable family stay. .
review: Dear Rishfa r,  What a great compliments! Our team works hard to make sure that every guest that checks in at our Andaman Embrace Patong enjoys a relaxing and wonderful experience. Having you notice those efforts and taking the time to give us a thumbs-up for a job well-done absolutely means to us.  We're so glad that everything from our Thai hospitality made your stay memorable and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Loved it!!!
review: Stayed in the hotel with small children. It was my second hotel in patong. The check in was so smooth they accept my early check in request and the interconnecting rooms given where wonderful my kids loved it. Kids pool was very good and lovely breakfast. .recommend it for families visiting patong.the hotel is centrally located everything you want is close by.

title: Helpful assistance from front desk - thumbs up
review: Dear Abdul A,  Thank you ver much for staying with us at Andaman Embrace Patong. Our team is very pleased to read that our family-friendly facilities and hospitality came to together to create an outstanding experience for you.  We look forward to welcoming you and your lovely family back to our pure leisure resort soon.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Disappointing
review: My wife & I were in Thailand for our first trip. This hotel was in an excellent location to the beach and a short walk to Bangla Road. Our room was quite large, on the 5th floor overlooking the pool. Palm and the team in reception were very helpful with our requests, including organizing a late checkout for us. Noo was very helpful at making our cocktails by the pool and ensuring we had a good time.

title: Spectacular hotel snd so awesome
review: The hotel is just near the beach and next to a market where you can find pkentyof activities and restaurants and bars and the staff are so helpful beside the food in the beakfast is so good and serves so many tastes like european and asian and international

title: Excellant Hotel
review: Dear mutasim a,  A big thank you to you for choosing to stay at our pure leisure resort. We are so happy to see that our dining options, easy beach access and excellent hospitality staff all left such a positive impression on you.   Next time you're looking for a perfect stay in Patong beach area, please allow us the opportunity to welcome you again.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Highly Recommended
review: Goodlooking hotel, excellant brekfast, excellant location, very polite and responsive stuff of the hotel, a big sized rooms with conditions, excellant and deep pool with bar and happy hours twice a day.

title: Another great Patong hotel
review: Dear Nas_Tya_ip_12,   We are so glad that your recent stay with us was so enjoyable at Andaman Embrace Patong. It is great to hear that overall hotel guestrooms, our Thai hospitality services and all facilities from our stunning outdoor pool to our easy beach access, were all appreciated.   Thank you very much and we hope that you will give us the opportunity to host you again next time soon.  Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: lovely for stay
review: We visited this hotel on a family holiday and the facilities of the place are very comfortable, staff is so friendly and supportive. They even upgraded our room on a special request and understandood all the requirements well. We highly recommend our stay :))

title: What a great hotel
review: Had a great stay at this hotel. Bed was super comfy and rooms spotless Staff very friendly and helpful. Ideally located and close to everything. We liked naughty nuries which is just 5 mins away. Would definately go back there

title: Second stay at Andanam Embrace
review: Dear PirateonTour999,  Thank you very much for staying with us and sharing your positive comments.   Words like “GREAT” are always a treat to see in our guest’s reviews! Your kind feedback is deeply appreciated and we’re happy to know that so much of what makes our resort special helped make your Phuket experience memorable. Our team looks forward to welcoming you again in the near future!  Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Beautiful hotel
review: It was lovely stay at this hotel, the rooms were very clean, and the staff especially Rome was very friendly and funny...  the breakfast was good.   We would definetly consider this hotel the next time we visit Phuket.

title: Visiting friends in Patong
review: Dear soukaina b,  Thank you very much for your kind review and had the opportunity to welcome you back as your second home. It's always a treat to hear when our loyalty guests like you love our resort's hospitality, especially Jerome, our Front Desk crew.   Please do not hesitate to contact us if you should need any help making arrangements for a return visit.  Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Good location,nice staff,good service
review: Very friendly staff with good English and very helpful. Nice rooms good pool very beautiful entrance stayed here with a friend great location right near shops, pubs and just a very short jaunt or walk from patong beach

title: Excellent experience
review: Excellent hotel, the staff was very helpful polite and knowledgeable, excellent location of the hotel, room was also very good, ambience was great, a big plus was their command on the English language.

title: We had a great time
review: Dear FARAN1234,  It is our pleasure to receive your positive review. Your support to our resort is really appreciated and we notice that our Thai hospitality services by our team members, the superb hotel location and the spacious guestroom were to your satisfaction. Our team would be very happy to hear your compliment.   We wish to say thank you for your great support and we hope you next visit will be as pleasant as this recent stays.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Definite destination hotel!!!
review: The hotel is conveniently located 5 minutes walk from the great sandy Patong beach. Our daughter really loved the pool of the hotel too. All the facilities in the room were good, though the lighting was a bit dim. Depending on the room location the street noise might be noticable, but it’s still a looot more quiet than Hong Kong for example :)

title: Great for families
review: Dear hermantom77,  We're glad that you loved so much about your recent stay at Andaman Embrace Patong and thank you so much for taking the time to compliment our resort's outstanding hospitality, lovely swimming pool, proximity to the Patong beach and all hotel's facilities.   Our team enjoyed having you with us and we can't wait to see you and your family again.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Excellent
review: Second time staying at this hotel and this time was so much better than I first remembered. The rooms are spacious and offer a sense of relaxation to allow you to rest and rejuvenate for the coming days activities.  Very close to the beach, shopping and leisure activities. Breakfast is simply brilliant!!! The best breakfast I’ve come across in Patong or Phuket.  However the best and most amazing feature of this hotel is the relaxing pool and pool bar! Two happy hours a day with a great menu and cocktail list!!   I’ll definitely be coming back to this hotel for all future travel to Patong

title: Holiday FUN haha
review: Stayed here for 3 nights at room 605 what a beautiful view to the sea and amazing pool balcony is of a very large size staff at reception especially fun and wan wete great and the manager por she was very helpful and understanding. Will come back again for sure. Korp kun ka

title: Amazing hotel at an amazing location!
review: Dear Isabellepsousa,  Thank you very much for joining us at Andaman Embrace Patong. Our team is glad that everything from our resort's outstanding views to our Thai hospitality left a very positive impression on you, especially Ms. Por, our Front Office Manager.   It would be our pleasure to serve as your beach destination next time you're in Phuket Island. Hope to see you again very soon.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Holiday Vacation
review: Wonderful hotel from head to toe! The staff was extremely friendly both at the check-in counter and the bar! The happy hour cocktails was amazed! The location was perfect, near the beach and the shops but not too busy! Getting around was simple and the hotel staff was really helpful in everyway. Definitely recommend it for anyone who's visiting Phuket!

title: Amazing hotel
review: Dear Nusy1989,  It was a pleasure welcoming you to Andaman Embrace Patong, Phuket! Our team takes pride in the hospitality we provide our guests with and we are happy to hear that our efforts exceeded your expectations.   Thank you very much for your kind words and know that we can't wait to welcome you back to our pure leisure resort next time you find yourself missing the beach.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Great hotel
review: After staying in 3 other hotels I finally found the only hotel I will stay at whenever I return to Patong area. Andaman Embrace is first class in every way at a reasonable price. Included in price is the friendly staff.

title: beautiful hotel
review: we had a good time here. the location is great really close to the restaurants, beach, shopping. the hotel is clean and the staff's are really friendly. the pool is clean and the breakfast are amazing.

title: Amazing stay
review: Dear Karina B,  It was a pleasure welcoming you to Andaman Embrace Patong, Phuket. Our team takes pride in the hospitality we provide our guests with and we are happy to hear that our efforts exceeded your expectations.   Thank you very much for your kind words and know that we can't wait to welcome you back to our resort next time you find yourself missing the beach.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Very Pleasent Honeymoon
review: Nice hotel with big room, good fitness center and big swimming pool, easy to get a taxi, mini market near  Good staff and food, was a pleasure stay and I will be back for sure, best hotel in Phuket recommended

title: Holiday
review: Dear eliassena26,  We always strive to leave our guests wanting for nothing and are glad to hear that we achieved that end during your stay at Andaman Embrace Patong.  Nxt time you're looking to enjoy outstanding hospitality, delicious food and fun in Patong area, we hope to see you again very soon!  Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Holiday
review: The services provided here was good. Room upgraded without any additional cost. Will definitely come again very very soon and recommend to our family and friends. Missing this place already. Hurt to say goodbye

title: Relaxing holiday
review: This resort acceded it’s hospitality we were upgraded to a deluxe double room with a ocean view because we had to wait after 2 pm for half an hour  Aiko who checked us in was friendly and spoke well English was fantastic to us  This hotel is impressive immaculate and close to the beach with a great pool close to bars and restaurants . The staff were wonderful. I highly recommend this resort .

title: Good hotel
review: Dear antoinettedenaro,   We were delighted to receive your feedback regarding your recent stay at Andaman Embrace Patong, Phuket. Our resort aims to provide a truly unique experience, and we are thrilled that we were able to exceed your expectations.   We thank you for the wonderful feedback about the hotel location, the beach and surrounding areas.   Thank you very much for being our guest and look forward to welcoming you back soon for another memorable experience.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Mr Colin Hird
review: Wow experience and good hospitality! Thank you for the great experience at your hotel. Will surely come baby again and recommend to friends and family. BreAkfast and facilities were awesome. Thank you once again.

title: Great resort in center of patong!
review: Dear Vijiheswary,  We would like to thank you for choosing our resort as your accommodation during your recent visit to this wonderful island, and taking the time to share your memorable stay with other readers.   We are very pleased to read that you appreciated the friendliness and assistance of our staff and enjoyed the facilities provided as well as loved the breakfast.   It was certainly a pleasure for us to be at your service and we all look forward to welcoming you again soon to the Andaman Embrace Patong, Phuket.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: MR
review: Checked into Andaman Embrace. Slight problem with room. Staff at reception sorted us out very quickly and efficiently. Special thanks to Rome and Fun for all their help. Hotel very well maintained and worth a visit

title: Nice place to stay
review: We and the family stay here for 3 days 2 night. The hotel call Andaman Embrace patong. The location at town patong, and only 2 minutes walking distance to the beach. The hotel it self also have a very big swimming pool and it's suitable for kids also. Really nice to stay here.. Feel like home.

title: Pathetic . . Poor Customer service
review: Dear Waannzz,  We are delighted to read your kind words about our perfect location and hotel facilities. We really does try to create a 'Home away from Home' for all of our guests, and we are delighted that they have delivered.   We are thrilled that the team gave you and your family a wonderful service with the added touches.   We hope to have the pleasure to welcome you back with us for your next visit to Patong Beach, Phuket.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Top of the Line Experience
review: I went to Andaman Embrace for 3 days stay & in these 3 days not even once my room was cleaned even after several complaints to the reception and the housekeeping. Requested for an iron board n they sent me a broken one.. other day I asked for an iron board & no response. After like 3 calls and 1 hour a lady came asking for what do I need.. arghhh save your money n mood people.. Ruined my vacation. Being allergic to dust it was very hard sleeping in that dirty and dusty room.. no hygiene at all. . Irritated.

title: Good holiday
review: Dear Amber S,  Thank you for reaching our and writing your first review in TripAdvisor. We are sorry you were not satisfied with your room accommodation and housekeeping service.   We will review the condition of your room with our team to ensure our guest rooms are up to hotel standards. We are sorry that you encountered a delay for iron  board requested. We have asked our Executive Housekeeper to the shortfalls and retrain the team.   Again, thank you so much for helping us improve our product and service.  Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: DO NOT STAY HERE
review: Friendly and warm staff, exceptional service and a great place with a genuine resort feel. Delicious breakfast served every morning. We were also granted a late checkout time a day before we left. Highly recommend! I'd give it a 6/5 if I could.

title: Great hotel in patong
review: We stayed one night in this hotel (3-4 jan 2019).  Very lovely room, spacious and clean. We also had a good bed for our baby. Excellent breakfast, the best we had in Thailand. Excellent location near patong beach. Very friendly and helpful staff in the lobby. Thank you for your kindness.

title: Faboules start on our Thailand trip
review: Dear SoukainaS105,  Thank you so much for taking the time to share your review and rating with us. We really appreciate your comments and we were delighted to read you enjoyed so many aspects of your stay in our incredible resort.   We look forward to welcoming you back again in the future.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Its like they dont even care!!!
review: Great help from staff Who is always smiling and helpfull Spend The New years Eve on The hotel with a great view.  Great breakfast and The rooms a Nice and clean A Nice small gym with The thinks you need to keep in shape 😅🙏

title: Amazing, value for money stay
review: Dear poulv2016,  We really are so happy to know that you have left "Andaman Embrace Patong" with so many fond memories, and for being so kind to leave such gracious feedback about every part of your stay and our staff, a standard that we pride ourselves with here. Indeed, the spacious guestroom and the variety and selection of our breakfast is a common delight highlighted by our guests and we are glad that you enjoyed it too.   Thank you so much for staying with us and we very much hope to welcome you all back again in the future.    Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.
