title: good location, nice food, great massage spa
review: They had their hay days - now - its just some tired looking staff - ugly pool - non-existent customer service especially kitchen and bell boy (forget about it).   Its so so - little by little - it will irritate you.  Their rooms are not bad, conceirge was good, wifi is good. Thats it!!!!! 😳  Pool - SUCKS... murky water too (eeeuuuiiiuuu).   Trainee doing breakfast omelette station was horrible - Super Slow and  - doesn’t understand English yet someone made her responsible for food - talk about a recipe for disaster especially with food allergies ... ❌❌❌❌📛📛📛❌

title: Not so good memories
review: Stayed there on the 24-26th December, and it’s the holiday season yet the nearby construction noise started at 9am on the dot every day.  My room view is the construction site itself.  First time getting in to the room, saw the view and the room air conditioning was not working properly. First impression of the money paid for this hotel was lost.  The variety of the breakfast buffet was great for both morning but when the construction noise starts, the good feeling is gone.

title: Wow what an amazing stay！
review: Dear lisa_valentine214,  Thank you very much for taking the time to leave us your feedback regarding your recent stay. We would like to apologize for any inconvenience you experienced during your time with our new phrase expansion, as they do not reflect the level of service that we strive to provide to our guests.   We would love for you to give us another chance in the future.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Memorable stay
review: We booked the hotel for the Christmas holidays and it has been such a lovely and memorable experience。The staff were so generous and helped us excellently with everything，the service was always at its best and the hotel overall created a relaxing atmosphere。 Worth the five stars。

title: Not worth the money you pay.
review: Dear WORLDVOYAGER1999,  We want to start by thanking you for choosing 'Andaman Embrace Patong' and for taking the time write us about your amazing stay. Our goal is to always provide the best service and accommodations to our guests and we know we hit the target with you.   We will be sure to share your good comments with the team because we know they will be excited about your feedback. We would love to be able to host you again next time you visit Patong Beach, Phuket.  Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Beautiful Patong
review: I am happy to stay in the hotel from 24-28 December 2018. We would like to come back to stay Herę next year. There is Patong beach nearby. And also, the hotel is very convenience place. There are a lot od restraunt nearby.

title: Comfy Stay in Patong
review: Great location, good facilities, nice view facing pool and sea partially, comfy bed, and accomodating front desk especially Ms Yuko and Ms Fun. Thank you Embrace Andaman. See you again next trip. Recommended!

title: Good Service
review: Dear jmcheng,  We appreciate you taking the time to share your amazing feedback on your stay at Andaman Embrace Patong. Knowing that you enjoyed everything from spacious accommodation and facilities really makes our day.   We will be sure to pass along your great comments and appreciation to Ms. YUKO and Ms. FUN, our Front Office member.   Your recommendation to other travelers and the time you took to share this excellent review are very much appreciated.   Thank you so much and look forward to welcoming you back soon.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Amazing hotel
review: Great service from Yuko.  The original room did not meet my expectations but they were fast to change the room to one that did...thanks to Yuko. Great location and value for money....next to Patong Beach and all the entertainment.

title: Very nice hotel all was Well
review: Dear igy v,  Thank you very much for sharing your recent experience with our pure leisure resort. We are very glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay in the superb location in Patong. Furthermore, it is a great pleasure to receive such a very positive feedback about our Front Office member, YUKO, I will be sure to pass along your kind words.  We hope to welcome you back at Andaman Embrace Patong next time you visit Patong, Phuket.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Fantastic Service By Staff
review: Amazing hotel with superb rooms. Loved the location and hospitality. It was totally worth it. Just the best hotel i could have taken for my holiday in Phuket. Live band at night in restraut was soo good, and the poolnis as grand as it looks in the photos. The room is soo huge and well equipped that i would highly recommend it to anyone.

title: Perfect Hotel in Patong
review: Hotel is really good in all matters. Sevice quality is remarkable. I will recommend everyone to stay in this hotel if you are coming to phuket.  Staff is really is cooperative. Excellent Service in all matter.

title: PLEASANT STAY
review: Dear hassam g,  We thank you very much for your nice feedback and comments regarding the quality of services and facilities received from our team. We have taken the liberty to share with them respectively as this is the standard practice for the important guest like you are entitled to.   On behalf of the team, we look forward to welcoming you back to Andaman Embrace Patong in the future.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Andaman Embrace stay
review: The reception was very warm,impressed by the welcome drink. Staff go out of their way to make one's stay pleasant. I am definitely coming back to this hotel and recommending it to my friends. Breakfast was amazing.

title: Excellent service by receptionist
review: Dear FeliciaN12345,  Thank you very much for taking the time to share your good experience with us and the TripAdvisor community.   We are delighted to read you enjoyed our high standards in customer service and quality breakfast at Andaman Embrace Patong, Phuket and we do hope you were able to take some time to relax and unwind in our pure leisure resort throughout your stay.   A warm welcome awaits your next return soon.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Very good
review: We stayed at the Andaman Embrace for 1 week. Overall the service was excellent. The staff were friendly and went out of their way for you. The breakfast had a wide variety of food and was very fresh. Although the foods available for lunch and dinner were average. The pool was lovely and the grounds well maintained. The hotel is in a great location; an easy walk to the beach and local restaurants and shops. The minimart our the front comes in handy when you just want a snack or something to drink!

title: Perferct location and excellent service
review: It’s my second time to visit this hotel I really like to stay here and the service is excellent the lady who helped me to finish my check in she was so sweet and smiles Wan, she gave me upgraded room when she know that we’re in our honeymoon  It’s close to the beach I’ll definitely come again same hotel

title: Very good and lovely stuff
review: Dear buthaya2016  Thank you very much for the positive feedback with our Front Office team and so happy to welcome you back this second visit to Phuket Island.   Andaman Embrace Patong is very unique and has everything for everyone. We like to celebrate everyone and hope that each and every guest has a great experience while visiting.   Again, thank you so much for this amazing feedback and look forward to seeing you again in the future.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Awesome experience
review: The hotel is a very wonderful place u can feel at home sweet home which every one here is at your service with there hearts also there restaurant has halal food for Muslim which is great at the end thank you for your hospitality.. With all my best wishes for all of you..

title: Andaman embrace hotel
review: Dear Yehia A,  We are delighted you found the resort fantastic and appreciate your excellent review. It means a lot when our guests like you share their positive experiences giving us the energy to continue to provide for all of our past, present and future guest.   Thank you very much for your confidence in our Andaman Embrace Patong and we look forward to welcoming you back your home sweet home soon.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Awsomeme experience
review: Hi, I have stayed here for one day. Great location near to patong beach & bangla road. Staff is very helpful & polite. Good breakfast & well cleaned rooms. Best thing is swimming pool area with bar. Would like to come again.

title: BEST HOTEL IN PHUKET
review: I stayed at Andaman for 3 nights and due to the excelente service and location decided to stay 6 more nights. 100% recommended. Great breakfast and best location (close to beach, restaurants and bangla)

title: Relaxing Holiday
review: Dear Carlos J,  Thank you so much for your wonderful feedback. We really appreciate your comments and will forward your review to our team as well. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with our resort and that you had constantly friendly staff and service, especially the perfect location in Patong area.   We hope you had a pleasant trip back home and look forward to welcoming you back again soon.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Good location & service
review: Great Hotel, Very helpful and polite staff,Full Breakfast, Good housekeeping, Situated in walking distance to beach and shopping centre, sea views from our room,  numerous restaurants in local area, Tour booking available from hotel,

title: Great place, impressed
review: Dear trevore514,  Thank you so much for your lovely review of Andaman Embrace Patong. We are delighted to hear you had such a great time with us. Here at Andaman Embrace Patong, we emphasis attention to details and a real person for what we do.   Again, thank you for your kind compliments and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Good Hospitality
review: Good location if you want to be in the centre of Patong and Bangla Road, staff were friendly and helpful, room service, and pool service responded quickly.  Small supermarket at the hotel which is very handy..  Only issue I had was the room when We first checked in which was facing onto a building site, a Crane was outside our bedroom window which started work/drilling  at 07:30am. After a long flight this was the last thing we needed. Reception were helpful and did move us to a pool side view which we were happy with

title: Great hotel
review: Very well located.  Walking distance to Patong beach and Bangla Road. Very friendly staff. Complete breakfast. Big room, big balcony and huge swimming pool with a bar. Would recommend it to anyone. Hotel transfer also arranged by the hotel but paid separately.

title: Location, Value, Service
review: Dear daniellc83,  Thank you very much for your gracious review of our Andaman Embrace Patong and of course staying with us. We are very happy that our team contributed to your experience. Indeed our location makes it easy to access all major points of interest in Patong Beach area. The pool and breakfast buffet line just received some improvements, such as lighting, breakfast items so that our guest can enjoy this while staying with us.   We thank you once again and look forward to welcome you back soon.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Good position in Phuket
review: Great location. Great Value and Great Service. On our 16th visit to Thailand we chose the Andaman Embrace for all of the above and I would Highly recommend Andaman Embrace to anybody :) Thank you to all the staff!!

title: Best location
review: Dear Lucy M,  Thank you so much for your wonderful comments on TripAdvisor. We greatly appreciate your kind words on our location, staff service and also value for money.   We look forward to welcoming your back to Andaman Embrace Patong very sooon.  Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Family visit
review: I recommend the hotel for who want to be near to the beach and the bests restaurants in Patong.  Also you have the opportunity to be in the most animated street with all the bests clubs and bars in Phuket.

title: Big Hotel
review: Clean and spacious rooms, Wide Breakfast spread. Kids Playroom Big Swimming pool,Overall had a nice stay. Keep 3000BHAT/Credit Card as they may ask for Deposit - For me they asked 3000Bhat for 2 Days stay. So keep some extra money or card in handy.

title: The most peaceful hotel in Patong!
review: Dear Sajin 1985,  Thank you so much for sharing your positive experience and kind words. We are delighted to hear that you had a nice comfortable stay at Andaman Embrace Patong, Phuket.   Allow us to share you about Cash Deposit requirement, the hotel will take cash deposit or an imprint of your credit card as guarantee against damage, incidental expenses and possible non-payment of bill. This is international standard practice and if you don't run any charges up so just make sure that at check-out you will get your cash deposit back in full or the slip with your credit card imprint to pervert misuse.   We hope to welcome you back for another memorable stay in Patong, Phuket.  Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: A pleasant stay
review: Clean and spacious rooms! Excellent value! Amazing pool!!! Good food! Great service! And good clientele! Also very close to the beach! If you’re looking for a hotel in Patong look no further this is the place!

title: Amazing feel-at-home hotel experience
review: Dear Boone10310,  Thank you very much for the comments and shared your staying experience with our Andaman Embrace Patong, Phuket. We are glad to hear that our staff services, our hotel facilities and great location meet your expectation and will keep to provide qualified service to satisfy guest requested.  Look forward to welcoming you back to Andaman Embrace Patong in the near future.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Very nice accommodation
review: We had an agreable stay at Andaman Embrace Phuket. The staff were friendly. The location of the hotel is not bad ( 5 minutes walking distance to Patong Beach). My wife and I appreciated the small supermarket at the entrance of the hotel it was very convenient.

title: Don't expect it meets 5-star quality
review: Me and my boyfriend made a one day stopover in patong beach and tried to find something to relax with high standard. We found this hotel with a high rating at booking.com but for us it's not a 5 star hotel! Compared to German standard it's more a 3-4 stars hotel. Air conditioning was loud but the staff was helpful and tried to fix the problem. In the end we changed room but air conditioning was also but noisy. The bathroom had a bit of mold. But in the end we sleped well and the breakfast was good. I would recommend to book only if you get a good offer for less than 30 eur a night. Then it's worth it.

title: Best suit for couples and family travelers
review: Dear Phil F,  Thank you very much for sharing this review with us. While we are glad to learn that you were happy with our resort by our lovely staff, we were disappointed to learn about your less than satisfactory experience with our A/C in the room. Your feedback is essential in helping us improve our services and please be assured that your comments have been shared with our team who continually strive to create seamless and positive experiences for all our guests.  Again, thank you for your kind comment and look forward to welcoming you back real soon.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Excellent staff
review: Professional and  best service given by the hotel. Superb location “few meter to the patong beach” With a great view of beach at morning  Big pool Room is large  Will return back to this hotel again  Tips request room with sea view 😁

title: "Birthday Arrangement at Phuket"
review: Dear neynahtazidah,  We really appreciate you taking the time write such a lovely review and for sharing your kind sentiments. The team and I are delighted you enjoyed all aspects of your stay, especially your room tips.   We look forward to the opportunity to welcome you back to our Andaman Embrace Patong soon.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Great stay, very central
review: Wonderful stay at the Andaman Embrace. Front desk staff were always so attentive and even upgraded me to an amazing Balcony room when I mentioned that I was there for a week celebrating my 10th wedding anniversary. Housekeeping were brilliant, and we always asked them to come in the afternoons and they always made the room look like if we were checking in. They also made a beautiful arrangement in the room for our arrival as you can see in the photos.   Breakfast was super delicious, although I missed cheese to consider perfect.   The pool staff were super friendly and always polite to greet .  The room was excellent, amazing view of the beach at the balcony rooms on the 6th floor.  Thanks Andaman Embrace staff for the wonderful stay.

title: Birthday trip to Phuket
review: First trip to Thailand for us. Staff at the hotel were amazing and so welcoming. Fantastic location in Patong, close to everything. Loved the pool and bar and of course the awesome food. Clean and comfortable rooms. Definitely recommend this hotel.

title: Excellent Accomodation
review: Dear Lynne S,  Thank you very much for your kind review and positive feedback regarding your first trip to Phuket, Thailand at Andaman Embrace Patong. It is with great pleasure that we accept your compliments to our perfect location, stunning pool and the awesome food, our Chef is most grateful for the kind compliment and recognition of his efforts and dedication in the kitchen.  Your comments on the service provided by our friendly staff are most gratifying and will be shared to the team who made your wonderful stay and had the chance to celebrate your birthday.  It was certainly a pleasure for us to be at your service and we all look forward to welcoming you again soon to Andaman Embrace Patong.    Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: club andaman
review: Very happy with room, staff very friendly & helpfu, with nothing being a problem. Breakfast buffet was enormous with plenty to choose from. Short walk to Patong Beach & Bangla Road, overall very happy with our stay

title: Average
review: Dear Wendy D,  Thank you so much for leaving us such lovely feedback of your most recent stay with Andaman Embrace Patong. We are glad to hear that you have thoroughly enjoyed your stay with us and that you found the location very convenient.    Should travels bring you back to Phuket Island, please do not hesitate to contact me via my email address dosm@AndamanEmbrace.com, and I shall be more than happy to personally create another memorable stay for you.  Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: A good time was had by all
review: i stayed there before it was done up went to puket after it was finished looks great stayed in 1 of the huts very close to beach about 25 meters away cheers and close to bangler road will b heading back next year to this place

title: An excellent friendly hotel
review: This hotel is everything you expect! Very clean throughout. The staff are very professional and friendly. The location is perfect to relax but within a 5 minute walk to the busier areas of Patong! I would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a 1st class hotel at reasonable prices!

title: Not my most favourite stay.
review: Dear Mbk40,  Thank you very much for selecting to stay at Andaman Embrace Patong, Phuket and sharing your positive review with us. We are so glad to learn that our convenient location close to Bangla area where you can easily find all good restaurants, shopping mall and entertainments.   We look forward to welcoming you back in the neat future.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Magyarország
review: I found the staff lovely.We had Ordered several dishes from room service, food arrived cold.Our room was nice apart from the airconditioner in our bedroom which was very loud. The pool area lacks atmosphere.Kids all swim in the pool bar area, rather than kidies pools.An incident with a Supervisor which caused my husband to discuss with Manager. Can contact me to discuss as I know it has never happened in any other place we have stayed. Many of us ended up with gastroenteritis, but can't say for certain why it hit so many of us.I feel more thorough cleaning needs to take place to help with an outbreak. Will not ever be returning to this place. Sadly,apart from the lovely staff I don't have a lot of positive  Feedback this time.

title: Very happy
review: Dear Irene,  Thank you very much for your thorough review, the good and the bad. We take all critiques very seriously and use them as our motivation to try and improve. It was heartening to hear that you enjoyed your stay for the most part of room and hotel staff.   We always process our food with good hygiene standards controlled by HACCP for all food safety concern in the hospitality industry. We don't want our guests sick due to our Thai food like two of your party. We think in this case our food is not a problem, it is likely that the condition of your stomach was not in a good condition or you can not eat levels of spiciness food like you ordered "Thai Chicken Green Curry".   While our resort is certainly very active, perhaps on your next visit to the island you can give us a chance, and it would be our pleasure to personally assist. We only want to see happy guests while staying with us.   If we may assist you in any way possible, please feel free to contact us and we will be happy to connect with you directly.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Good location
review: It was the best holiday in my life,this hotel is perfect,for me the first class :) Good area,clear room,really friendly staff,good breakfast,fitness room is perfect for me. The pool is big and water-temperature everytime good to the actual weather. Check-in and check-out was very easy,I became all the information for my relaxed holiday. Thank you for all and see you next time,I'll be back :)

title: As same as what other people did felt on this hotel
review: Other people opinion is absolutely correct on this hotel. Staff is absolutely rude and untrained. Even this hotel HVAC show bad situation...Room never be cooled with proper way...we had to stayed most humidified room. And also, this hotel totally discovered by most uneducated mainland chinos. So, if U want to have most uncomfortable hotel in Patong area, then this one is absolutely suggested one.

title: NOT A 5 STAR HOTEL
review: Dear Richard K.  We truly thank you for having taken the time to post a review following your stay and we apologize sincerely for your experience which falls far short of the standards we strive for and which you can rightfully expect from us.   Please do contact me by email if you wish to give further details of your stay, so I may investigate further, dosm@AndamanEmbrace.com.   Sincerely yours,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Value for money and I will be visiting again.Conveniently located.
review: Do not stay here! The price reflects the quality. Better to stay at the Holiday Inn Express around the corner. Staff were extremely rude, rooms are deteriorating and uncomfortable, and the hotel only seems to remain afloat by nickel and diming its guests. If you're looking for a nice and affordable place to stay, don't be fooled by the '5 Star' rating of this hotel — frankly, it's a miserable scene at this hotel from check-in to the add-on fees at check-out.

title: Rude staff, damaged room worst I have ever stayed in.
review: Dear Daniel M,  Thank you for taking your time to share this valuable feedback on our standards which were not met. We would like to extend our sincere apologies for not meeting your high expectation and please rest assure that we have address the service shortfalls you have experienced with the department concerned and rectification work are in place to better improve our service.   Both our Front Office and Housekeeping team have received your review and will act promptly as we do aim to provide a memorable experience to all our lovely guests.   We hope for the opportunity to serve you again in the future.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Complete waste of money
review: We found all the staff to be professional and polite. The 2 guys at the pool bar were fun to chat with and proved more than capable during the busy happy hour at the swim up bar.The main pool depth is perfect at 1.5 meters. All the staff, reception, catering, cleaners, gardeners presented with a greeting and a warm friendly smile. We enjoyed a large room, with comfortable chairs for watching T V. Our initial room had the shower located withing the high sided bath. We were relocated to a similar room with a shower and no bath. My wife has a knee injury and  found it difficult to access the bath.  There is a small mini mart located within the hotel, the coffee at 25 baht is a bargain. The mini mart does sell small bottle of beer, REMEMBER ALCOHOL SOLD BETWEEN 12 & 2.00 PM THEN…

title: Average
review: Where given rooms facing the demolition site next door which was extremely noisy. I couldn't relax in the room during the day. Eventually got a move to a pool facing room and all good. The staff were average and not overly helpful or present (especially around the pool when wanting to get or drop off a towel).  Everything is a little tired but I suppose you get what you pay for. Breakfast - average at best.

title: Nice staff.
review: Dear Paul M,  Thank you so much for taking the time to share your value feedback. We were disappointed to learn that our hotel did not meet your expectations. Please be assured that this is not the standard that we aspire to and we will share your concerns with the appropriate members of our team moving forward.  We hope you allow us the chance to share a more positive experience with you soon.  With regards,

title: Fading Splendour but still very good
review: We here for meetings, every time we here worm welcoming from management alway helpful, every staff very good taking care of us. Clean area and nice place, have family mart opposite receptions. Close to the beach 5 minute walk..

title: Thailand May/June 2018
review: Dear Lovely M,   Thank you very much for the 5/5 review.   We're thrilled to hear that you had a great experience with us. It's wonderful that you loved our best prime location, nice staffs, cleanliness in all guest areas. We'd love to have you back again to share an even more positive experience with you soon.  Have a wonderful day!  Best regards,

title: Hotel stay close to Bangla Road.
review: This place would have been a great place to stay back in the day, the Sino Portuguese architecture is very elegant but is now starting to look old and tired and must be hard to compete with the new resorts in the area. I was a bit underwhelmed at first my room did not look anything like the glossy Balcony Deluxe room photos online but the very friendly & capable reception man took care of this and 1-2 other requests all very courteously & ably. Staff are very courteous, meals are very good and at reasoanble prices for a hotel of this class. Pool is OK, location is excellent ... 2 minute stroll to the beach just around the corner from Rat U Thit (massages, restaurants, night markets).

title: Beautiful
review: We had a very pleasant stay. Our booking was messed up by the site we used but hotel staff quickly fixed it for us which was very much appreciated after a long day of travelling.  All staff were friendly. Breakfast was also fantastic, food for all nationalities. No complaints here. Excellent access to everything. Pool bar awesome & pool staff very accommodating. Not a critisism but a mere suggestion, kettle, cups, glasses etc in rooms could all be updated, a little tired is all 😍

title: Incredible hotel
review: Dear Wayne N Lee J,  It was a pleasure having you with us and I am pleased that you enjoyed your stay at Andaman Embrace Patong.   As you have experienced, our team member are the lifeblood of our operations and they always provide a unparalleled lever of service that have lasting impressions on our guests. I have personally passed on your kind words to the mentioned staff member and we all look forward to welcoming you back on your next trip to Patong Beach, Phuket Island.   Best regards,  Bhumibhat M.

title: Our Favourite Hotel in Patong!
review: My wife go to Thailand every year and have been staying here for the past 6 years and now won't stay anywhere else. After trying a few other hotels there really is no compromise. The staff are fantastic, the pool bar is the best around and the rooms are always clean and inviting. The location is perfect with nice beaches and great restaurants within walking distance. Can't rate Andaman Embrace highly enough!!

title: Okay but not great
review: Deat wbcaprice,   Thank you very much for staying with us at Andaman Embrace Patong and for your kind review which is very much appreciated.  We are pleased to know that your stay was satisfactory in every aspect, and look forward to an opportunity to welcome you back soon.  Respectfully yours,   Bhumibhat M. Director of Sales & Marketing ANDAMAN EMBRACE PATONG

title: Average
review: I travel to Phuket once a year with a group of friends and we have stayed at various hotels, but for the past five years, the Andaman Embrace has been our hotel of choice! Best features of the hotel are: - The rooms are clean, spacious and modern. - Hotel staff are very friendly and recognise our party every time we return. - The pool bar is FANTASTIC!! Happy hour every day is awesome and we make very good use of it! Nok, Torn and Noo are awesome bar tenders and are happy to be shown new cocktails if they aren't familiar with your request. They also let us play our own music \m/ - Pool bar must haves:   * Satay sticks   * Spring rolls   * Coconut shake (you can make it alcoholic by adding rum into it - delish!) - This year, the girls and I tried the Thai Cooking Class. It was a…

title: Amazing!
review: We have loved our stay at Andaman! Great location, 2 min. walk to beach, 10 min. walk to Bangla Road. Wonderful live music out the front by Sheila and Marvin! The pool bar was a highlight, thank you to Noo for looking after us! Breakfast had lots of variation, from Thai food to Western food. Our Phad Thai cooking class was unforgettable. Will be staying here on our next trip to Phuket.

title: Great location, great service
review: Dear Sarah H,  We just loved the fact that you enjoyed every single moment of your stay with us. Rest assured that I have already share your personnel compliments to the team members nominated on your review and they were sure proud. Thank you for making their day even better than it started. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back to our resort again in the near future and please do not hesitate to contact rsvn@andamanembrace.com for a return guest's rate!   Best regards,

title: One of the best non sea side hotel
review: We stayed here 5 nights in a room with balcony overlooking the pool. We had a very relaxed time, lazing around the pool. Very easy access by foot to the nightlife in Bangla and all the eateries along the way.  We enjoyed dinner here one night and the food was great. Live music every evening at the chess bar, easy listening and sing along.  We had a couple of minor things in the room that were fixed up as soon as I reported them.   I've seen many remarks on trip advisor from guests at various hotels with respect to things not being completely satisfactory and the first time the hotel hears about it is on this forum. My advice,  if you have an issue raise it at the hotel and give them a chance to correct it. You'll have a much better stay.

title: cool and great location
review: Dear Derek,  I am happy to read that you had a pleasant stay with us and that you especially enjoyed our central location and thank you for your fantastic feedback on our service. I will be sure to share your kind words with the entire team.   I look forward to welcoming you back to Andaman Embrace Patong very soon.  With kind regards from Patong,

title: Disappointed
review: The rooms are big for 3 people to fit in . It has pool side bar. It has a business centre. From the hotel to the beach is a walking distance. As there are unexpected tsunami so there have indicated the way out of there .

title: Lovely romantic getaway in the heart of Patong
review: We stayed at Andaman Embrace for 3 night getaway and loved it! The room was very clean, with pool view and even some sea view, which was unexpected bonus for the hotel's budget friendly rate. The staff was very helpful, seamless check in and check out. I really enjoyed the Peranakan design of the hotel and the location - so close to the beach and fun of Bangla Road, but at the same time on the quiet street away from buzz and noise. Overall, amazing value for the price, will be back for sure!

title: Great hotel with great location
review: Thank you so much for your kind words. We are pleased to know that you received the best of the Thai hospitality. The team was very pleased to know that you enjoy every single moment of your stay.   Alisa T, we look forward to have you coming back soon and do not hesitate to contact our r Guest Relation Team at info@andamanembrace.com  if you wish to receive the details of our Returning Guest Promotion.  "Incredible Value, Unbeatable Location"

title: Awesome experience !!
review: We loved stay at Andaman Embrace hotel is so close to Patong Beach and a short walk to Bangla road,  5 minutes to Jungcelon.The staff were all really helpful and the food was really good. Spacious  and clean room. Hightly recommended.

title: No Happy Ending
review: Your impressive reviews were very grateful and thankful. We would definitely try our best to continue good service and standard in order to meet more guest satisfaction and requirement. Thanks again for loving our great location and all other hotel facilities. We look forward to welcoming you back here again in the future.

title: Best spur of the moment holidays
review: We have hosted a few groups there and the staff has been very helpful at Andaman Embrace, if budget permits the suites are absolutely divine ! They do have meeting rooms which can also host other events that can go on later through the night that made our guest very happy.

title: A special holiday spoilt by hotel!!
review: A booking made 6 months in advance with a special request for 3 rooms on one floor, we arrive to find that we have two roms 2 floors apart and the other room away from the main building. When the matter was raised with management no alternatives were offered.  One room floods the floor every time the shower is used as the one side of the bath/shower is built in such a manner that this happens no matter what you do. When the matter was raised with management the answer “ just put towels down” the water flow is too great and the room is a safety hazard.  The pool doesn’t open until 8.00 am, no early morning access at all.

title: Unimpressed.
review: Dear Rufus2545,  First of all, I would like to apologize for the negative experience that you had. Holidays are very special for everyone as we work hard throughout the year to have an enjoyable time.  Your constructive feedback towards our bathroom service is duly noted and I had a discussion this very morning with our Chief Engineer to get a closer look there. We know our swimming pool is the jewels of our hotel and the service have to be better than what you mentioned.  Rufus2545, in the hope you will give us a second chance, feel free to contact me directly at salisa@andamanembrace.com . It will be my pleasure to assist you personally for your reservation and show you our improvement.

title: Okay
review: Room was small, felt only modestly clean. Truthfully, I was most disappointed by the customer service. Given what I paid for a top-level suite, I expected folks to be a lot warmer and accomodating. Instead, I felt like a burden every time I had to go to the desk to ask for anything. Even checking in was uncomfortable as the employee behind the desk seemed incredibly perturbed to be working. That said, the pool is nice and the location is great.

title: No fuss and easy hotel near the Patong area.
review: We are terribly sorry for disappointing you during your stay. It's useful and informative for us to continue good service as well as to review what shall be done. Our hotel is always eager to welcome any comment in order to met more customer satisfaction. We're gald to hear that you love our pool and our location. Thanks for your comments and we hope we have a chance to welcome you in the future.

title: a good stay
review: The hotel is very well situated.  The breakfasts are quite adequate although not very exciting.  They urgently need a manager on the floor whilst breakfast is being served.  The food was cold as the flame to keep the food warm goes out and guests do not close the lids, but nobody checks.  The only way that the staff knew that there was no bacon, coffee cups etc was when a guest informed them, and it was quickly rectified.  However, they should have been aware of these things before we had to complain.  We were there for New Years Eve and the cost of the event was added to your accommodation bill whether you wished to attend or not.  Besides the buffet dinner there was a terrible singer, childish competitions eg musical chairs.  The tables were set out around the pool, with no…

title: Nice Hotel, But not up to her grade
review: Clean and well maintained hotel... Hotel room is big, compound of the hotel is big also, but with a small toilet... thats why I think it should not grade as 4 star, some even grade it as 5 star..  Check in counter filled with trainees and inexperiences staff caused the check in take longer time..  Location is good with massage parlor, FamilyMart and seafood restaurant just along the street..  Bangla Street is within working distance about 20mins, and u may choose to walk rather than use tuk tuk..  Breakfast is good, and like their coffee..

title: Good location, good view, bad wifi
review: Your impressive reviews were very grateful and thankful. We would definitely try our best to continue good service and standard in order to meet more guest satisfaction and requirement. Thanks again for loving our great location and all other hotel facilities. We look forward to welcoming you back here again in the future.

title: Good Hotel
review: I like this location. It's not quite in the center, but you can walk there.  It's close to the beach and there are plenty of restaurants and shops nearby.  Plus it's relatively quiet.    The room was big (we booked a 1 bedroom) and seemed very clean. It wasn't especially comfortable, though - the pictures are accurate in that respect.  It does have a fridge and a microwave.  And if you're on a higher floor, the view of the ocean is quite nice.    Many staff were great, but we did have a few problems as well (rude or sullen).  If you want a second key card, you have to pay 200 Baht.  The water was smelly.  Worst of all, the wifi was unreliable and therefore frustrating (I had some work to do).

title: Very poor hospitality
review: Thank you for your recent stay and thank you for your valued reviews. It's useful and informative for us to continue our good service as well as to review what shall be done. Our hotel is always eager to welcome any comments in order to meet more customer satisfaction. Thank you again and we hope to have a change to serve you again in the future.

title: Good Location, could do with refurb.
review: We have started here for 7 nights.   Good things: - verry good position in Pathong. - The street is not so crowded and is quiet at night, nor many places here are so) - Good staff - ppl from reception are responsible  - Good wifi (only at reception in the lobby) - big rooms - Pool is ok  - Good breakfast with many choices.  - Good price  Bad things: - very bad wifi in rom - most of the time not working - breakfast was same everyday  - hotel not looking like a 5 stars hotel  Overall a nice experience here. I recommend this hotel.

title: Andaman Embrace Patong
review: A very pleasant stay at the Andaman, however some of the rooms are looking a bit tired and in need of a refurb particularly the bathroom. The staff were attentive & caring and did their best to ensure that our stay was pleasant. The swim up bar with happy hour is always a good value. One small negative was the need to pay an extra 200 Bhat for a spare access pass. My wife and I do different things and only having one key issued is not ideal.

title: Return visit with friends.
review: We all would like to express our sincere thanks for your recent stay with us. Your impressive reviews have brought a cheerful support for us to pursue growth opportunity and to meet more customer satisfaction. Regarding the general maintenance plan, we are actually refurbishing our facilities on the planned schedule. Thanks again and we look forward to welcoming you back Andaman Embrace in the future.

title: Need a lot of improvement on condition of entire hotel
review: My wife and I had visited previously in May/June this year. We decided to return with friends in November as we love this place, close to everything and everything you need for a great stay. Whilst there in May/June I mentioned the fact that there was no bacon for breakfast, that has now been fixed as promised by the General Manager, Noppan Suwanpruke. Way to go Joe!!!! My wife was given a cake and bottle of wine for her birthday which was a nice gesture from management. We will certainly return to Andaman Embrace in the near future. Our friends also liked the experience. Thanks to all staff for making us all welcome.

title: Cool time with my friends
review: Your impressive reviews were very grateful and thankful. We would definitely try our best to continue good service and standard in order to meet more guest satisfaction and requirement. We are very happy to have you here with us again. Thanks again for loving our great location and all other hotel facilities. We look forward to welcoming you back here again next year.

title: Really great place.  Cottages
review: Rooms need to be carpeted , condition of furniture in the rooms are bad , shower head-Flow rate of water very Low . Room service menu have very few options and they don’t go to the extend of providing any other menu except the one provided - the same restaurant have a larger options but for room service I wander why such limitations. I will never Recommend this hotel to anyone unless you want to feel my experience.

title: 3 star at best
review: My wife,myself daughter & grandson had ajoining rooms 501&502. Both these rooms had ocean views. this hotel is located on a busy road motorbikes, tuk Tuks with 2000watt sound systems going until 3 in the morning even parking under our window blasting at full volume. We stayed 2 weeks &I when we asked if we could get an upgrade they told us"we don't give upgrades they were very dismissive.this is a short stay hotel used mainly by Chinese tour groups Located close to beach,shops&restraunts 20 min walk to Jung Ceylon&Bangla rd,cleanliness of rooms ok improved after tipping  breakfasts ok not much variation from day to day  Hotel in need of an update.Pool and Pool staff  very good, nothing for children except toddlers where there is a small play area inside the hotel. Generally,…

title: Incompetent front desk
review: Thank you for your recent saty and thank you for your valued reviews. We are very sorry to you about TUK TUK because it's over our control. Our hotel is always eager to welcome any comments in order to meet more customer satisfaction. Thank you again and we hope to have a change to welcome you again in the future.

title: Great location but a little tired
review: Had room 622 which is considered a deluxe room located on 6th floor Southeast corner which offers city view.  Check in was great.  Room was spacious and clean.  Bed was comfortable.  Bathroom needed work.  There was mold on wall side of tub due to poor design and lack of cleaning.  Shower water temperature would change constantly.  Internet worked good.  Air conditioning worked good but there is a good amount of noise from air vent.  Breakfast was included and was outstanding.  There is a cook whom makes omelets.  Fresh fruit was outstanding and included watermelon, pineapple and papaya.  Cost 180 baht from Phuket airport to hotel on shuttle van.  Van holds about 12 persons and I had to wait about 15 minutes before there was enough people.  Ride to hotel took an hour.  Night…

title: Great Location
review: We are very sorry for disappointing you upon cheack out. We assure you of more seriously retraining our staff how to be more professional and we'll inform our outsourse  Taxi company to beware about timing of service. Thank you again for your comments and we hope to have a chance to welcome you again in the future.

title: Awesome hotel with great pool bar
review: Great location.  Easy walk to beach and shops.  Hotel a little tired and needs a good clean and refresh.  Had a lot of mould in bathroom and on pillows.  Staff where polite but not overly friendly.  Food was good.  Shout out to the man who organises the tours in the foyer.  He was funny, helpful and honest.

title: Good for stay but not for food
review: If you have a family then it's good for stay, market is near, beach is at walking distance.  Food quality is not good. You should look something in bangla street.  They do charge extra for visiting guests which others don't charge.

title: Amazing place
review: Thank you for your recent stay and thank you for your valued reviews. It's useful and informative for us to continue our good service as well as to review what shall be done. Our hotel is always eager to welcome any comments in order to meet more customer satisfaction. Thank you again and we hope to have a change to serve you again in the future.

title: Had a good holiday
review: We had an amazing stay at this beautiful resort. Wonderful staff and pool also close to everything :) walking distance .... we can't speak highly enough of this resort. Breakfast was great and room service. Lovely clean rooms and housekeeping service. The staff are extremely wonderful and speak good English. Highly recommend the Embrace spa right next door too. Thank you guys see you again soon.

title: Very nice
review: Your impressive reviews were very grateful and thankful. We would definitely try our best to continue good service and standard in order to meet more guest satisfaction and requirement. Thanks again for loving our great location and all other hotel facilities. We look forward to welcoming you back here again in the future.

title: Very old hotel
review: This hotel is very nice but definitely not the best.   It was very clean and the service was wonderful.   The pool was lovely , the breakfast was a little boring, the same things nearly every day.  The best thing was only 2 mins walk from the beach and the wonderful little restaurants on the beach and it would be a 40 mins walk (which doesn"t feel that long) to Bangla Road .  It is on the quieter side of Patong.  Would stay again even though it is not 5 star as the price is wonderful.

title: andaman
review: beautiful place with lovely pool and nice service . we stayed for 5 night last year and that was a very good experience . food was great , clean rooms, good staff. the hotel was very near to the beach and that was very lovely.

title: Dissapointing hotel for its 4 star rating
review: We all would like to express our sincere thanks for your recent stay with us. Your impressive reviews have brought a cheerful support for us to pursue growth opportunity and to meet more customer satisfaction. Thanks again and we look forward to welcoming you back Andaman Embrace in the future.

title: Andaman
review: The location of the hotel is great only a short 5 minute walk to beach...This hotel is large but thats about it, it has no ambiance, feels stale and cold, the staff are very non helpful, do not make guests feel welcome... everything seems like a hassle for them... breakfast is like eating chinese take away everyday ( ground hog day) . The rooms were big enough, shower was terrible, no water pressure and the shower rose too short to I had to be an acrobat to wash my hair... The pool is large but unlike other hotels if leaves fall in, unless that specific pool cleaning staff member is near by the leaves sit there, its a ( not my job mentality at this hotel) other pool staff just leave them.. overall an OK stay,I would not stay again however..

title: Patong escape
review: Thank you for your recent stay and thank you for your valued reviews. It's useful and informative for us to continue our good service as well as to review what shall be done. Our hotel is always eager to welcome any comments in order to meet more customer satisfaction. Thank you again and we hope to have a change to serve you again in the future.

title: Ideal place for Ideal holiday
review: Loved this place, very clean rooms and very helpful,staff loved the pool bar and the staff that ran it too holiday was amazing I would stay here again and again, lots to do and see in patong I really didn't want to go home breakfast was lovely and there was music on at the bottom of the hotel nearl the road so lovely so if you get the chance to go do it , also the room we had was amazing really big and the bed was great

title: TERRIBLE!!! DO NOT STAY HERE!!!
review: This place was an absolute joke! Wifi doesn't work, terrible customer service!!  Could go on forever about the trouble and issues had at this hotel but there's not enough space!! Management are a disgrace!! In particular Arporn & Baifern! Not even worth the rating of one star!!! Good luck to anyone wanting to stay at this hotel!

title: Great Spot
review: We are very sorry for disappointing you during you stay. Our hotel is always eager to welcome any comment in order to meet more customer satisfaction. We are please to serve every guest in the same way but sometime we have to service by piority to meet all guests satisfaction. We are please to confirmed that our WiFi are in good condition but sometime it's also depent on the machine or moblie phone.Thank you for your comment and we wish to have a chance to welcome you in the future.

title: Horrible Service
review: We thought this was a great hotel. The room was huge with a fabulous view over the pool, sea and mountains. The staff were always obliging and friendly. The breakfast and lunches were always excellent. As was the service. The pool was fantastic and the pool staff were always great. Sure the hotel rooms may need a revamp but more than satisfactory and clean and comfortable. Would recommend and hopefully come back one day. Great bars, restaurants and massages so close. Loved it.

title: Perfect Location & Amazing Hotel
review: Your impressive reviews were very grateful and thankful. We would definitely try our best to continue good service and standard in order to meet more guest satisfaction and requirement. Thanks again for loving our great location and all other hotel facilities. We look forward to welcoming you back here again in the future.

title: Had a great stay at Andaman Embrace!
review: I stayed here on 9-10th of July. On the time of checkout I was told that the bill would be sent through my booking agency. Apparently they've been following up with the hotel for the last 10 days and they tell me there is no response or what's over. It's quite frustrating to shoot mails after mails just to get a copy of the bill. I would like to get this sorted as quickly as possible.  To come to the facilities, it was average at the best. Never a 5 star listing, 3 at Max.

title: Getting Away From The Cold
review: Decided to have a mid winter break from the cold. Found a deal on the web and booked this excellent hotel.  Situated near all the fun spots but far enough away from the noise of this vibrant town . Room was a budget room overlooking the pool but was clean and tidy ( little tired could do with a refresh)  Staff provide service above and beyond the norm. They are friendly and engage in conversation enquiring on well being and plans for the day  The breakfast buffet was adequate. Lunch around the pool the standard pizza burger club sandwich menu.  Being off season plenty of beds on the shady and sunny terraces. Fully recommend a stay.

title: Good standard Thai 4/5 star
review: Your impressive reviews were very grateful and thankful. We would definitely try our best to continue good service and standard in order to meet more guest satisfaction and requirement. Thanks again for loving our great location and all other hotel facilities. We look forward to welcoming you back here again in the future.

title: Amazing stay
review: Andaman Embrace is located in the lively Phuket district of Patong. It is well located near to restaurants and the beach.  The hotel is a good standard for 4/5 stars in Thailand. The rooms are modern and clean. It has a cool pool with a bar and a DJ. The best thing about the hotel is the value; it is incredibly cheap for what you get.

title: Good location, enjoyed the stay
review: Your impressive reviews were very grateful and thankful. We would definitely try our best to continue good service and standard in order to meet more guest satisfaction and requirement. Thanks again for loving our great location and all other hotel facilities. We look forward to welcoming you back here again in the future.

title: Dissappointing
review: This is our third stay in Patong we decided to stay at the Andaman Embrace hotel & boy we were not disappointed.. the staff are so beautiful & friendly I can't say enough in regards to them.  We stayed 14nights in the cottages for the quietness & yes it was that & more. Very private & a beautiful setting..  It's walking distance to joncelyn shopping centre & Bangla road, end of the street is amazing food markets just opposite the beach.. we personally love the location..  all we needed was a comfortable bed, shower, definitely aircon & fridge & coffee making facilities & the hotel delivered.. It's not a 5 star hotel I'd put it at 3 3/4  to 4.. we had a great stay & were well looked after.. it's what you make of your holiday,  don't sweat the little stuff..

title: One bedroom suite with nice views
review: The one bedroom 2 bathroom suite was huge and had a big patio overlooking the ocean, which was a block away. Good location about 10 min walk to Bangla rd if that's what you are into. Our friends stayed in the standard rooms which were very good price for the quality. The pool was great, friendly staff but we didn't enjoy the breakfast food or service quality (stale bread, no table service for coffee/tea even though 4 staff were standing around doing nothing).  Beds were hard. When will Thai hotels start supplying softer mattresses that don't feel like sleeping on the ground???)

title: dated but clean
review: Thank you for your recent stay and thank you for your valued reviews. It's useful and informative for us to continue our good service as well as to review what shall be done. Our hotel is always eager to welcome any comments in order to meet more customer satisfaction. Thank you again and we hope to have a change to serve you again in the future.

title: Excellant holiday at Patong
review: I was disappointed on arrival the rooms were dated but they were clean. The staff were very helpful with the problems we had with booking ie trundle bed was paid for along with breakfasts for the extra guest however on arrival they charged us for them to later refund them. The beds were extremely hard the pillows made up for this. The pool was uncleaned there was a ring of discoloration around the top of the tiles oily. The spa was over priced and there were many other spas around the area which were better priced. We had a garden view room which overlooked the pond and could see the ocean pleasant outlook until you looked at the eaves which were falling down and a bird was nesting in there..

title: ナイスホテル
review: Thank you for your recent stay and thank you for your valued reviews. It's useful and informative for us to continue our good service as well as to review what shall be done. Our hotel is always eager to welcome any comments in order to meet more customer satisfaction. Thank you again and we hope to have a change to serve you again in the future.

title: Not to bad
review: We went to Patong on a Scoopon package. The hotel was FANTASTIC! Great breakfast buffet. Nice pool. Friendly and very helpful staff. Lovely room - king size bed, well equipped bathroom. Great daily room service. Couldn't ask for more. Will go to the Andaman Embrace again!!!

title: this is not five star at all
review: this is not five start at all. location is really beautiful..I think the hotel should take huge renovation..all are old emanates. there are lot of hotel beside patong beach cheaper than andaman embrach hotel. i wont never come back here.

title: Poor Hotel. Will not stay again even if its for free
review: Thank you for your recent stay and thank you for your valued reviews. It's useful and informative for us to continue our good service as well as to review what shall we done. title: Nice view and very relaxing
review: (1) Terrible breakfast, not many choices and flies are everywhere. This is my eighth time in phuket and its the worse breakfast selection i have see.   (2) room is dirty and specially in the toilet, the shower is very very weak in the water pressure and water smell like gasoline and yellow. when you open the cupboard, the cupboard door is rotten and its dusty inside. the cupboard doesnt close once you opened it  (3) decoration is very old when you look out of the window the paint or wood is peeling off or rotten   corridor en route to the hotel room, we arrived at 7.30pm and the hotel doesnt turn on any light its so dark that you felt unsafe/insecure staying here just for a few seconds in the corridor   (4) bed is fairly clean  (5) air-condition is not responsive, the room is…

title: Andaman Magic!!!!!
review: We are very sorry to learn that you were not hppay with our hotel during your stay. Our hotel is always eager to welcome any comment in order to meet more customer satisfaction. Thank you for your comments even some of them it's not meet our hotel policy and our operation as usual.

title: Could be better, but we made the best of it.
review: We had a suite on the top floor with a nice outside patio giving us partial beach view. Sunsets are incredible from up there. Not many places have this in Patong. Rooms are spacious and clean and include a small kitchenette. Nice pool area with a pool bar. Breakfast buffet is pretty good for Asian standards. Walking distance to the beach. 7/11 and family market within 2 min. on foot.

title: Ok for the price but could be better easily
review: It wasn't expensive so was ok for what we paid for. The staff were please t but seemed uninterested half the time (excludes bar staff). The hotel is nothing like its website portrays, though most hotels aren't this place missed the mark with the room quality and with the access to consumer reviews it's not something they will get away with. The room was dated and needed a clean I.e. Mould removal around shower not just a daily sweep. The food was the biggest let down as breakfast was cold if you didn't get up for the 6:30am start. Also we had to send room service back for being cold and hours old re-heated fries and a cold club sandwich.   On the positive side was the pool/pool bar. The staff were great and despite an earlier review we actually enjoyed the Chang Pool Party. It…

title: Paul Harris
review: Thank you for your recent stay and thank you for your valued reviews. It's useful and informative for us to continue our good service as well as to review what shall be done. Our hotel is always eager to welcome any comments in order to meet more customer satisfaction. Thank you again and we hope to have a change to serve you again in the future.

title: Helpful friendly staff
review: Firstly, this is the first time I have stayed in large, family style budget accommodation. Firstly, the room. Clean, older style, tiles coming off floor, aircon efficient but wet floor every morning, giant bath/shower bordering on dangerous particularly for older guests, shower...hopeless...freezing then instantly boiling! Grounds and pool are excellent. Service adequate but usual language difficulties. Breakfast was included in our package and was always excellent except for the same Kenny G music every morning! This resort obviously targets Chinese visitors...no issue here other than being woken early most mornings by yelling in the corridor as groups left for their trips...maybe large 'quiet' signs in the corridors would help. All up had a great week with friends but will…

title: Awful awful awful
review: Thank you very much for your valued review and thank you for your recently stay with us. As we are friendly to everyone. We firmly believe that other hotels are doing the same thing. On the other hand, the market situation gets changing and more Chiness people are traveling to Thailand and Phuket. Thank you again and look forward to weilcome you in the future.

title: Not a 5 star
review: A good resort in a great location only downside of the location is Hatpatong Rd which is a bit noisy at night. Overall hotel needs a bit of TLC. Beds are very hard. The staff are very helpful and friendly, Fun at reception and Thorn in the bar where great. We where in the embrace suit which had mold in the shower and house keeping only do a basic once over every day, not wiping over benches or cleaning vanity basin. Breakfast is good but they Don't  have bacon every day but you can order and wait for it if you wish. But the price is very reasonable and overall a nice place to stay.

title: Good enough for price paid
review: Resort is best for location and nice modern rooms. Hotel is equivalent to the price you pay, good enough. Only thing I was a bit disappointed in was the breakfast. Breakfast was more catered to Chinese customers, which I think is main customers that stay here. Felt like some basic western breakfast items were not at breakfast. There was no bacon, only ham. Only jam was available as a spread, and there was not anything like peanut butter or nutella. Sausages were like plastic, not good. I would rather have gone out for breakfast locally instead. But at the end of the day we didn't pay much for room so overall pretty happy for what we paid

title: Bad than Good
review: It was our great pleasure serving you as your home-away-from-home. Your valued review was also grateful and we will take it as our sincere commitment to continue good service and cordial hospitality. We are very sorry that you don't happy with some items in our buffet breakfast and we'ld like to inform that you can order more from our buffet and our staffs are very please  to do that for you. We all here look forward to welcoming you back to our family soon.

title: Disaster
review: Bad  1) Slow Check In  2) Liaised with the hotel directly with which room I wanted, staff Salisa replied that there is a room with all the things I mentioned and went ahead to book with Ms Bo, confirming the arrangements were made. But when I went in the room, there was no windows with blinds for the toilet facing the bedroom. If there isn't, just say there isn't. Ruined my birthday on the day itself.  3) There was a bug on the bed.  4) Can hear the noise from outside and also aircon.  5) Bathtub design was bad, where the water flooded the bathroom.  6) Shower water was brown on my last day and took some time to clear out all of it. Super disgusting.  Good 1) Nice pool and bar  2) Buffet breakfast was good but same variety everyday.

title: Great location and hotel
review: Thank you for your recent stay and thank you for your valued reviews. It's useful and informative for us to continue our good service as well as to review what shall be done. Our hotel is always eager to welcome any comments in order to meet more customer satisfaction. Thank you again and we hope to have a change to serve you again in the future.

title: Worst check in ever.
review: This hotel is a disaster! We booked in via online from another hotel. Upon checking in we were told they do not have our booking. After showing them the confirmation, they told us to wait as it's not in the system. We waited for almost 40 min and finally decided to go out and have lunch and was told the room would be ready in 30 min. We were back after an hour and the room was still not ready! The staff were not professional and were arguing in front of us. After a few minutes they took us to our room, and to our surprise there were another guest belongings in the room! I just ran out and told her it's a guest room & she just laughed and took us down again to the reception! She did apologies after.. It was almost 3pm and it was a freaking hot day and we were getting annoyed at…

title: Fantastic junior suite No.602!!!
review: Great room 602 with a spacious terrace overlooking the beach and sea! We had a fantastic time and celebrated my 55 birthday! (Although I had not got the promised cake)))) Excellent breakfast, a few minutes to the wonderful beach! Beautiful music in the evenings! All the restaurants and shops nearby. Friendly and helpful team! Thank you!

title: Great Hotel.
review: Your impressive reviews were very grateful and thankful. We would definitely try our best to continue good service and standard in order to meet more guest satisfaction and requirement but we are very sorry that we miss somthing for you and it's very improtant for us. Thanks again for loving our great location and all other hotel facilities. We look forward to welcoming you back here again in the future and make sure that we will miss for next year.

title: Fantastic stay! Can't wait to return!
review: If you like to have a great holiday, you must be here. The staff is great and honest, they are very helpfull and they have a great feeling of integrity. If there is anything for you to ask, you can ask the staff, Thai or Japanese, they are always giving their best for you. The breakfast is great, if there is anything you want, ask for it and if they have it, you will get it. If you are complaining about anything here afterwards, it's not right. Complaints you have to talk about it here at the location and a solution will be found. And we know, as a returning guest!

title: Hotel was decent, management was a let down.
review: We all would like to express our sincere thanks for your recent stay with us. Your impressive reviews have brought a cheerful support for us to pursue growth opportunity and to meet more customer satisfaction. Thanks again and we look forward to welcoming you back Andaman Embrace in the future.

title: Winter getaway in Patong, Phuket!!!
review: During our weekend at Andaman Embrace, we could not have been made anymore welcome. As soon as we arrived, the staff were super attentive and we immediately felt we made the right choice. The room was spotless and the bed was really comfortable. The swimming pool was our favourite thing about the hotel. The hotel itself was really well located - not in the middle of all the chaos but still close enough to walk there within a few minutes. I can't wait to return there for my next holiday.

title: Friendly staff and great location
review: Staff were very friendly and helpful from arrival right through to departure.  Pool area and swim up bar were fabulous but could probably benefit from more loungers around the pool.  Rooms were comfortable and clean but are probably ready for a paint job. Walking distance to beach and shops. The buffet breakfast will keep you going all day and was superb. Great holiday.

title: Not a 5 star hotel
review: We all would like to express our sincere thanks for your recent stay with us. Your impressive reviews have brought a cheerful support for us to pursue growth opportunity and to meet more customer satisfaction. Thanks again and we look forward to welcoming you back Andaman Embrace in the future.

title: excellent location
review: This is not a 5 star hotel, but then I didn't pay 5 star money for it.  The rooms were good and the Wifi was excellente compared with what is usually offered in that region.   The hotel in general looks like it has been run on a tight budget, there are quite a lot of maintenance needed in some areas and pretty much every surface in the hotel could use a fresh coat of paint.  Pool and hotel bar was nice but way too expensive compared with everything near by and offered nothing extra to justify the cost.  If you can get this hotel for a good price I totally recommend it.  There is also a BIG construction project going on just east of the hotel, didn't bother us at all though.

title: holiday
review: We all would like to express our sincere thanks for your recent stay with us. Your impressive reviews have brought a cheerful support for us to pursue growth opportunity and to meet more customer satisfaction. Thanks again and we look forward to welcoming you back Andaman Embrace in the future.

title: Excellent Location Economical Stay
review: a very good location for a luxury hotel . stayed with family for four days in january . about 10 minutes walking distance from Patong beach . the only downside is that the wifi did not work in the room. it only worked in the lobby . breakfast buffet was superb . since we had 2 kids , we didn't know how the food would turn out to be . it was extremely satisfactory . loved the pool and the pool side bar . amenities and room service was great . hotel needs a paint job on the outside though . shall come here again .

title: Not worth the money
review: +: The hotel has s good location.  +: The rooms offer a comfortable bed and everything you expect.  +: The breakfast buffet is huge, western and Asian style. +: I got the first day free 2 beers and 2 cokes in the minibar. Daily you get 2 bottles of water. -: One of the first things they informe you (orally and written) as solo traveler, that they are not girlfriend friendly. Strange. -: The first morning I arrived at 6.45 at the breakfast. Nobody there to make egg dishes. And nobody arrived for half an our. -: The 2nd morning I got a call at 7.30 am. Nobody answered. -: 1 hour later the housekeeping rang the bell twice. -: Information about there offer is not really good. About there needs they tell you a lot. +: The staff is OK, but not really friendly. For me it was worth the…

title: Location Location Location
review: We are very sorry for disappointing you during you stay. It's useful and informative for us to continue our good service as well as to review what shall we done. Our hotel is always eager to welcome any comment in order to meet more customer satisfaction. Thank you for your comment and we hope to have a chance to welcome you in the future.

title: Rude staff
review: This place was awesome from a location standpoint.  You can walk so many places because of this location.  About 4mins to the beach, 10mins to Bangla Road.  Close to many restaurants and great service at the hotel.  We took a 1 bedroom suite and it was huge.  Everything was awesome except one day brown water came out the shower, luckily i wasn't in the shower at that time.  It was pretty gross to see.  Hotel apologized, but i wish i didn't see that.  Breakfast was included, but it was okay, i didn't eat much there.  I would come back to this hotel.  It has great service, nice and big, great location and lots to do closeby

title: Holidays with firend
review: We all would like to express our sincere thanks for your recent stay with us. Your impressive reviews have brought a cheerful support for us to pursue growth opportunity and to meet more customer satisfaction. Thanks again and we look forward to welcoming you back Andaman Embrace in the future.

title: honeymoon
review: This is the first bad review I have had to write.. Not good. We stayed here for our last few days in Phuket after a 6 week holiday mainly in 3*  Hotels and wanted a bit of luxury to end. Staff very rude and condescending. If you have a problem ( with me the air con. produced water all over the floor because of a blockage ) they do not appear to care. Hotel image is great ( pool area best bit ) but wait until you get in the rooms  very 3* . All of this is unusual in Thailand. Location is superb and food is good. There are a lot of superior 5* hotels in Phuket so check them out..

title: Location, location. location
review: As the heading of the review summarizes it's all about the location. Close to the beach, restaurants, shopping center & night life... All in easy walking distance.  The hotel however lacked that homely feel. Staff were friendly but reclusive. Whenever you needed something there was a wait....Front desk was well staffed but there was a shortage in other areas.. Pool guy was working hard...  On the whole a pleasant stay. Rooms were clean & the hotel tidy . However it falls short on general maintenance which seems to be true for all the hotels in the area . They build a new hotel & then fail on the upkeep...  Would I stay there again ? Possibly but not without looking around more & checking out the competition & prices...

title: Not as good as on booking sites
review: Your impressive reviews were very grateful and thankful. We would definitely try our best to continue good service and standard in order to meet more guest satisfaction and requirement. Regarding the general maintenance plan, we are actually refurbishing our facilities on the planned schedule and It will be conducted in an appropriate time and period. Thanks again and we look forward to welcoming you back here again in the future.

title: Great resort! Worth the price!
review: Hotel overall OK. I think pool area is the best part of this hotel. The room itself had a funny maldy smell. Bed very comfy, good few tv channels, powerful shower. The reception staff not as professional(not all of them) but good few have this "I can't be bother to help" attitude. Definitely not 5*(nowhere near).

title: Clean room, great service, good location

Our hotel is always eager to welcome any comments in order to meet more customer satisfaction. Thank you again and we hope to have a change to serve you again in the future.

title: Not as nice as the pics on the internet
review: Absolutely amazing! Great service! The room is very nice and clean. Love the pool and it's just a walking distance to the beach. Staffs were very friendly and attentive. If you are looking for a quiet neighborhood but just a walking distance to shopping areas, bars and the beach then totally recommended!!!

title: 2 Star hotel.
review: Management at this hotel should really take our reviews seriously and lift there game or go broke!!! Your hotel and staff are really pathetic. We stayed in the lotus cottage.....same as other bad reviews on here....wifi a complete joke....we complained several times, staff placed a modem in our room to no improvement at all.  The bath constantly leaked which made for water laying on the floor almost all day and every day. We complained to several staff to which we were ignored. The new GR manager offered a down graded room .....said that no upgrade was available. Staff lost/ delayed giving our faxes for our tours....we had to call the tour company to re send. Staff very unprofessional in the check in counter and hard to communicate with. The hotel is very dated so dont be…

title: Back at this lovely resort and will keep coming back
review: Thank you very much for your informative review and comments. We also thank for your recent stay with us that helped us see what shall be done to meet more guest satisfaction. We assure you of more seriously retraining our staffs how to be more professional. Thank you again for your stay and we look forward to welcoming you again in the future.

title: Horrible services ! Barely a 3* hotel !!
review: Stayed here with my husband for 4 nights while on holiday in Phuket. Room is very clean and decent in size.  Breakfast at the restaurant was pleasant with a good selection of food and fruits. The location and staffs are the best things about this hotel!!! This area is quiet enough and away from the mad crowd at Bangla and Jungcelyon( 15 mins walk) and only 2mins walk to the beach. The hotel seem to be very popular among Australian guests (we talked to many of them at the pool bar) and Japanese guests (cause there are 2 Japanese staffs at the front desk) Totally recommended!

title: "Locally 5*" but in actual fact barely 3*
review: Your impressive reviews were very grateful and thankful. We would definitely try our best to continue good service and standard in order to meet more guest satisfaction and requirement. Thanks again for loving our great location and all other hotel facilities. We look forward to welcoming you back here again in the future.

title: Lunch menu
review: I travel frequently to Thailand and this hotel just ruined my impression of the country! The staff was a bunch of disrespectful goons who tried to make money off us when they gave us water bottles as well!! They wifi did not work most part of the stay! The staff lost our luggage when we checked in and we had to go searching for it ! Then the receptionist started screaming at us for following up on where our luggage was !!! This is the worst hotel I have ever stayed at !!!! DO NOT RECOMMEND IT TO ANY ONE! There are better hotels at lower rates don't pay in advance like I did and was stuck with this place ! The rooms got mosquitos and the staff can't be bothered cleaning up ! Worst hotel ever

title: A nice place to stay, with a good location
review: Stayed here in a suite for 6 nights. The room was on 6th floor, ( Have 7 floors)  and had a big balcony, with partly ocean view. The staff was very nice, always smiling and very helpfull! Hotel was clean and nice, but like all other old hotel, it had some small issues that could be fixed. The breakfast buffet was good, with fruits and asian food, not so much bread/onleys. Swimming pool area was nice and big, but there could have been done some maintenence, like fixing the broken lamps in the pool, and maybe upgraded the filtration system as well.  Gym was ok, but i think that with more then 200 rooms, there should be more than 1 thredmill, and towels should also be easily available.  Overall, we had a good stay her, close to the beach, resturants and shops :)

title: Great resort
review: It was our great pleasure serving you as your home-away-from-home. Your valued review was also grateful and we will take it as our sincere commitment to continue good service and cordial hospitality. We all here look forward to welcoming you back to our family soon.

title: Excellent Hotel with very friendly staff
review: We stayed here for the last 11 nights with our 4 year old twin girls. The greatest asset of this resort is the lovely friendly staff. The staff are always willing to help and made a big fuss of our girls. The location of the resort is great being close to restaurants, shops and the beach. The rooms are very comfortable. Highly recommend this place for a young family. It would be great if activities could be organised for the children in the kids club.
