However, this is only a minor issue as we managed to keep the kids occupied each day. Have to mention Sorn, he was amazing. Sorn took us for a 1 day tour around Phuket. He is such a kind person. We had a wonderful time at the Andaman and highly recommend this resort.

title: Great location and enjoyable stay!
review: We all would like to express our sincere thanks for your recent stay with us. Your impressive reviews have brought a cheerful support for us to pursue growth opportunity and to meet more customer satisfaction. Thanks again and we look forward to welcoming you back Andaman Embrace in the future.

title: A great VALUE and a great PLACE!!!
review: We just returned from a holiday trip to Patong beach in Thailand and stayed at the Adaman Embrace Resort & Spa hotel. We were impressed with the friendly staff and excellent service. Friendly smiles everywhere, rooms are well serviced and spotless cleaned every day.  The food is excellent, freshly prepared and served. No request to staff seems to be too much for them as they try to accommodate to your every wish and request. At quite hotel only meters from the beach and around the corner from the busy main road. Ideal for families and couples alike. Be aware of the guys on the street who are trying to "promote" a new hotel by giving away free scratchies and sure enough you are the winner of the main prize (a cruise, iphone,ipad etc "completely free" as they claim. THIS IS A SCAM…

title: Best Service In Town!
review: My cousin and I stayed in the Andaman Embrace for 5 nights in a twin room (no balcony).  From the moment you arrive the porters and reception staff make you feel at home with their professional and courteous attitudes, I was super impressed before I even entered the room.  Speaking of the room, we found all areas to be clean and smelling fresh, and the only downside was a small rattle noise in the aircon vent (which was hardly an issue at all).  A big thanks to Fun for making us feel so welcomed, your service is beyond amazing, and we look forward to seeing you again soon!  Ricky M.

title: Location location and wonderful staff
review: Your impressive reviews were very grateful and thankful. We would definitely try our best to continue good service and standard in order to meet more guest satisfaction and requirement. Thanks again for loving our great location and all other hotel facilities. We look forward to welcoming you back here again in the future.

title: Beautiful views from hotel, and happy helpful staff.
review: My friend and I stayed at this hotel for ten days in September. Even though it was during the 'wet season' we had a fantastic time. The hotel's location is ideal for walking to the beach, shops and restaurants. The Manager and all staff were so friendly and helpful I would certainly stay at the hotel again. For those who enjoy a great breakfast buffet, this hotel has a great selection. The pool has a swim up bar and lots of beds to relax on...a great experience overall!

title: Location is everything
review: We all would like to express our sincere thanks for your recent stay with us. Your impressive reviews have brought a cheerful support for us to pursue growth opportunity and to meet more customer satisfaction. Thanks again and we look forward to welcoming you back Andaman Embrace in the future.

title: Great Hotel with Strategic Location
review: Room was nice, with beautiful views from the 6th floor. Food was good as were the happy and friendly staff. A lot of Chinese people staying here,  Close to beach and entertainment. Loved the swim up pool. Room service very quick. Always left the room tidy and clean, nice to come back to after a trip out.

title: Friendly Staff
review: The staff were always helpful and the room was always cleaned very well. Any issues were fixed straight away. Great central location. I stayed in one of the junior suits with excellent sea views and big balcony.

title: Embrace it or not?
review: Your impressive reviews were very grateful and thankful. We would definitely try our best to continue good service and standard in order to meet more guest satisfaction and requirement. Thanks again for loving our great location and all other hotel facilities. We look forward to welcoming you back here again in the future.

title: Very clean, comfortable, well located hotel.
review: Beach view Room with Balcony. Room was good and view okay. Top floor. Pool is nice. Gym is good. Shops and food was good too. Plenty of food offered and variety at breakfast. All seemed good. Reception always helpful and pleasant. I like the location. Walking distance from Bangla Road about 1 klm. Good walk along the beach avoids getting harassed by peddlers and scammers.  A new building has just commence next door. The noise nay float into this hotel so some rooms will get most of the noise. Bungalows and Garden View rooms will still be okay I think.  Might be okay but a building in construction can be noisy.

title: Not 5 Star but good value
review: Your impressive reviews were very grateful and thankful. We would definitely try our best to continue good service and standard in order to meet more guest satisfaction and requirement. Thanks again for loving our great location and all other hotel facilities. We look forward to welcoming you back here again in the future.

title: Cozy yet comforting
review: Was upgraded to a balcony room free of charge. Lots of staff, all very friendly and helpful. Pool was excellent size and very clean. Fridge/Freezer in room was very handy for storing purchased drinks and ice. Walking distance to everything (even jungceylon mall & bangla road)

title: It was a very pleasant stay !!
review: This is the 1st visit in phuket and we are glad that we choose that hotel. It has wonderful sea view and a wonderful swimming pool area. Loved that pool side bar even though we didn't got chance to use that. Buffet breakfast was also good. Had difficulty getting room service sometime . Reception area should be more lively . Also thanks for the complimentary food.

title: Get what you pay for
review: Thank you very much for your favorable review on your recent sdtay with us. We are delighted you had experienced all satisfactory service especcially our pool atmosphere surrounded and our buffet breakfast. Thank you again for your stay and look forward to welcoming you in the future.

title: Decent hotel with good amenities and services
review: Room is fine for what the price was. Definitely recommend balcony. Toilet doesn't flush very well. They charge for ice 50 bart a tub. Breakfast service was very poor I gave the man my room number at least 3 times at entry then was pursued by another woman again asking my room number 2 more times. Breakfast not great .  Location is good. Very reluctant to provide 2 room keys yet you can't charge anything if you aren't in the room as the power won't work without key so have to sit and wait for things to charge before leaving. The hotel guide stresses if you take room items you pay and then house keeping didn't replace one of our towels after cleaning so I was very keen to ensure this was replaced! Hotel seems directed at  Chinese and Indian tour groups.

title: Great Location, refurbished
review: Thank you for your recent stay and thank you for your valued reviews. It's useful and informative for us to improve and continue our good service as well as to review what shall be done. Our hotel is always eager to welcome any comments in order to meet more customer satisfaction . If you plan for next stay in Phuket we wish we are one of your selective hotel.

title: Repeated Visits!
review: Room was decent, bathroom had a bath tub. No balcony, this was a bit of a disadvantage as drying beach wear was problematic. Otherwise, room is comfy, clean and decent. We had trouble with air conditioning (went off towards midnight) but prompylt rectified by attentive and responsive staff. I especially enjoyed the gym facilities. It was spacious and well equipped. Swimming pool is great, however, tiles were a little chipped. Need to be careful especially with kids.  Lovely manicured lawns and a green surrounding. Yet, hotel's location is very close to the beach. Information on local tours easily available at the lobby. But best to take a walk around Patong town to compare price and service among the many tour agents. Short walk to convenience stores, the beach and eateries.…

title: Accommodation without hospitality
review: The room was good with amenities you would expect, and location is great.  As a side note the Family Mart very close by have lovely staff.  Electrical gremlins pervaded the WiFi and TV. These could be overlooked as they were fixed eventually.  The staff, though numerous, are less than helpful.  Asking for a taxi yields nothing more than a 'please go outside', pointing to the street.  The first night's concierge tried to direct us to his friend's travel company when he saw we were looking at the travel company in their lobby.  No POS machine at the bar so paying by card for drinks involves going to front desk.  There are exceptions - one of the concierge staff was lovely and the hotel manager helpful - but as a whole the staff simply acted amateur and inhospitable.

title: Lovely hotel and walking distance to everything
review: Thank you for your recent stay and your valued reviews. It's useful and informative for us to improve our service as well as to review what shall be done. Our hotel is always eager to welcome any comments in order to meet more customer satisfaction. Thank you again for your comments and we hope to have a change to welcome you in the future.

title: Nice white room
review: This is a great hotel......location-wise, it's perfect.....laundry, massages, restaurants, tour operators literally across the hotel.  Walking distance to the beach and all the busy hotspots.  Bangla Road about 10 mins walk away.  Very safe even late into the night.  Friendly people in and around hotel.  Lots of shopping can be done by merely walking down the street. Deluxe rooms are great except no balcony.  Pools available for adults and children.  Only problem we had when showering was that the water runs along the edge of the tub and falls onto floor.  Look for Song Pee Nong massage parlour (not happy ending massage).  Very friendly lady who gives a great massage.

title: Nice but needs to improve
review: It was our great plesure serving you during your recently stay at our hotel. We're very glad to learn that you had experienced in all impressive service through your stay till departure. We'll take it all to try the best to continue our service and we do look froward to welcoming you again in the future.

title: Great value
review: Stayed with my parents. We booked the one bed room with the balcony. Beautiful sea view and natural sunlight in the room. Made our holiday special especially sunset , drinking beer from our balcony. We enjoyed staying here.  The pool is huge.   However three thing to take note. The first, show room in the room is not really good. Always drain and wet. The second is the majority of the guests(90%) are Chinese.  The noise during breakfast is horrible. Manner is bad. Recommend to come to eat after 9 am so that they left for tour.  The third one is weak wifi for the corner room.   Staffs are friendly and helpful. Overall it's worth for money.  The management of the hotel should consider for the guests. The music noise of the pool party held on 30 apr wasn't stopped till 22:15 !!! …

title: Pleasant hotel
review: I found it much like staying in a city hotel.  The reception area is large, marble and quite grand.  The room was clean with adequate wardrobe, drawer and dressing table space and I found the bed very comfortable.  The lack of a balcony meant that attempting to dry a beach towel and swim wear was near impossible in the well air conditioned room.  Room service was not great quality, cold and took forever to arrive.  There is an "in hotel" shop that we didn't actually see open but there is a little supermarket around the corner. The pool area was lovely and the swim up bar was great. The hotel is a short walk to the beach and the bars and restaurants.

title: Sore back.
review: Thank you very much for your recent stay and thank you for your valued reviews. Your message will certainly passed onto our staffs in order to continue our great customer service. Thank you again and we look forward to welcoming you again in the future.

title: Great resort and located a minute from the beach and a 10 minute walk to the nightlife
review: Really nice staff and helpful. The room was very average though, mattress was very hard on a base of bricks I think. Shower head was an issue if you're over the height of 5 feet. And wifi was almost non existent when connected. Walls in the unit were paper thin as you can hear anything in the hallway and people flushing their toilets. And buffet breakfast could be improved. Also not many caucasians at this resort.

title: Great stay at Andaman Embrace
review: Thank you for recent stay and thank you for your valued reviews. It's useful and informative for us to continue good service as well as review what shall we done. Our hotel is always eager to welcome any comments in order to meet more customer satisfaction and we hope a change to welcoming you again in the future.

title: 10 nights in Phuket
review: I used my chase card reward points and the the chase concierge reviewed all the resorts that met the criteria I was looking for ( four star+ , swim up bar and walking distance to the nightlife and right next to the beach) the staff was awesome, the room was great and when I ordered an Irish coffee which they have never heard of and it was legit.

title: Value for money
review: Check in fine room wasn't ready but wasn't an issue, just left our bags at the hotel and went for a wander! Room was nice 604 view of pool and a sea view,  Only thing that let the room down was a little mould round the silicon in the shower. Breakfast was nice, staff a bit slow to take your room number when entering. Hotel location could be a bit noisy due to the road, but otherwise good, 2 min walk to the beach, 10 min  walk to Bangla road, lots of restaurants and bars close by. Pool service was non existent if the hotel want to keep people round the pool they could encourage the staff to come round and offer drink/food. Another point was the music, it wasn't an issue to me but I was aware that if I had children it would have been as every second word of some of the songs was…

title: Staff need motivation
review: Thank you very much for your favorable review on your recent stay with us. Your massage will certainly be passed onto our staff in order to improve our customer service. We are very happy to hear that you like our location and our breakfast. Thank you again for your stay and look forward to welcoming you in the future.

title: Good location; overpriced.
review: I've stayed here a few times in the past when it was the Club Andaman Beach Resort, the last visit was 5 years ago. I loved the atmosphere of this hotel,the wonderful grassed areas leading down to the two pools. Yes room needed renovating so I jumped at the opportunity to revisit the new Andaman Embrace. Stayed for 6 nights in a Balcony sea view room on the sixth floor (603) which dod have a very good veiw. Initially we were put in 510, but the aircon in this room went from cold to colder and as we like it on 24-25 degress we found we had to turn it off at night as it was freezing. The aircon couldn't be fixed so we were moved. The renovation are very cheap and already show signs of wear and tear.Although the rooms photograph well the laminates on the 2 rooms we were in had seen…

title: When our vacation will start?!
review: Thank you for your recent stay and thank you for your valued review. It's useful for us and information for us to improve our service and review what shall be done. Our hotel is always eager to welcome any comments in order to meet more customer satisfaction. If you plan for next stay in Phuket we wish we are one of your selective hotels.

title: An amazing trip
review: Beautifully located just a few minutes walk to Patong beach. The Resort was always beautiful and clean. The buffet breakfast was very average and extremely overpriced if it was not included in the package. The food at the resort was also very average and overpriced; we spent most of our time across the road eating. We had a group of 8 people and it took us a long time to check in and out. The pool staff were wonderful although the cocktails were very expensive and the waiter tax was quite expensive. The BBQ buffet out the front was cold and expensive, I ordered room service once and had to ring back 4 times before they answered. One night we had no hot water; and for 2 of our 10 days there was no Wifi. The bed was also rock hard; but the rooms were always cleaned nicley.

title: an ok place to stay
review: hotel is clean and nice, located close to the sea and not far from the city attractions, yet at the same time the hotel seams to be focused on large groups from main land China and not English speaking guest, I found the staff did not speak English, the internet in the hotel did not work at all, and when I asked about it I was just told in bad English that I was the only one with a problem so I should figure it out myself. the brekfest was dirty and the food had bugs in it even when still in the refrigirator, I would not stay at the place again

title: Very good hotel near Patong Beach
review: Thank you for your recent stay and thank you for your valued reviews. It's useful and informative to us to continue good service as well as to review what shall we be done. Our hotel is always eager to welcome any comments in order to meet more customer satisfaction. Thank you again for your stay and we look forward to welcoming you in the future.

title: Let down...
review: Brilliant 4* hotel that lived up to the expectations I had before booking. Checkin was prompt and my room on the 6th floor was well equipped and had a huge balcony with great views, although not a beach view I didn't spend much time there. The hotel pool and fitness centre are really good and of a high standard, and Patong beach is only a 5 minute walk away. Bangla road is far enough (10 minutes) to get a good night's sleep! I had breakfast included in my room rate and would recommend this as there was alot of choice. If you need laundry done or to book a taxi I would recommend venturing out of the hotel as you will save alot of money. There are also a number of 7-11s nearby as well as some really good restaurants.

title: Andaman Embrace revisited
review: It was a great pleasure welcoming you at our hotel. We are delighted that you had experienced all satisfactory service especially the breakfast atmosphere surrounded by the pool and fitness center. Thank you again for your stay and we look forward to welcoming you in the future.

title: Good rooms however staff behaviour is disappointment
review: Currently staying here, was sure to confirm before booking that the WIFI was 100% as my partner needs it to keep in contact with work clients. Since being here 5 nights, have been unable to connect at all. Tried several times daily. Queried at reception, was told 'sometimes works, sometimes doesn't'. So have ended up having to buy an expensive roaming pack from home.  Hotel rooms nice and clean, breakfast very average. Cold pancakes, undercooked crossiants, and no bacon! Definately wouldn't pay to get the buffet breakfast again. Much cheaper outside of hotel with better options. Good location but plenty more in the area,  wouldn't stay again.

title: Brilliant hotel and location
review: Really enjoyed my stay here, the hotel was relatively clean and the staff were really friendly. The location of the hotel was pretty much perfect, close to Bangla road (but not so close that you can hear everyone partying or see drunk people stumbling), close to the beach (5 min walk) and close to the family mart store or 7/11 store.   Room is fully equipped with fridge, safe, hair dryer (no iron), towels and tolietries. Saw a few comments about the pool being dirty, but it wasn't that bad, few leaves in the pool but thats about it..   The breakfast buffet was pretty decent. Serving western breakfast (waffles, french toast, selection of ham/meat slices, cereals, bread with toasting machine) , oriental breakfast (congee - not the best though) and rice with complimentary dishes.…

title: Terrible
review: Thank you very much for your favorable review on your recent stay with us.We are also very glad to learn that you had experience in all impressive service through your stay till departure. we'll take it all to try our best to continue our services and we do look forward to welcoming you again in the future.

title: Greate plac and great team
review: I cannot understand why there are so many good reviews for this place.  Firstly the Staff! Terrible. Slow slow slow. Everything slow. They simply did not care at all. Ordering a drink at the bar averaged 25 - 40 minutes. (yes we timed it)  Modern rooms not bad, but shower pressure terrible and water temperature, variable.   The best thing about this place was the lady at the tour desk who was VERY accommodating. The only reason I am giving this 2 stars as opposed to 1.  Breakfast left a lot to be desired, but the Coffee was VILE! Well presented though.  But most importantly it was the staff that contributed to the overall disappointment of the place. Such a stark contrast to Bangkok.   Simply - I would not choose to stay here again. There are too many other hotels in Phuket that…

title: Slow check in. Waterfall in room from air conditioner or bathroom upstairs. Disgusting.
review: We are terribly sorry for disappointing you during your recent stay with us and thank you for your valued review. We assure you of more seriously retraining our staff how to be more professional. Our hotel is always eager to welcome any comments in order to meet more customer satisfaction. Thank you again for your stay and look forward to welcoming you in the future.

title: pemandangan yang indah
review: I spent at the hotel during a weekend that included amazing hospitality accompanied by personal attention from the staff, led by POOHEMI despite routine requests known to respond well. The rooms are cozy and clean amazing pool and everything looks modern and beautiful. It is recommended to arrive

title: Seclusion in the heart of Patong.
review: We were in town to compete in asurf carnival and the organisers put us up here because they were supporting the event. What a great place. 75m from the beach, and only three blocks south of Soi Banghla and JungCeylon. The bellman gave us a the best in room briefing a/c controls wifi, lights, safe, the works and wouldn't take a tip. Front office staff polite and on the ball. The resort also has thatched roof cottages out the back just like Patong in the 80s.Very nice Thai ambience a great place to stay. Pool is good and gym is clean n well set up but no bench press.

title: Just an all great place to stay
review: It was a great pleasure welcoming you at hotel recently. We are delighted that you had experience all impressive service through your stay with us. We'll take it all to try our best to continue our service and we look forward to welcoming you again in the future.

title: Our stay at Andaman Embrace Resort
review: Our teavelling Party of four stayed here from 6/11/15 thru to 13/11/15. This was the first time in a long time I booked a holiday thru a travel agent & to my surprise the accomodation was fantastic. From the check in to the check out, the staff were very helpful & welcoming. Our rooms were 615 & 618. They where clean, tidy & the air conditioning was quite cool.  Happy hour at the pool was a bonus & the pool was great too. Breakfast was part of our accomodation & was a good mixture of western & Asian food. Location of the Hotel is very good. Located up the North end of Thanon Ratuthit Rd the actual location is halfway along the road between Beach Road & Rathuthit rd (Hatpatong Rd) Easy to get around & if you need some local transport, see Mr Sorn at concierge or Ms Yuri at the…

title: We did not enjoy our stay at this hotel
review: Thank you very much for your favorable review on your recent stay with us. We are delighted that your party had experience all satisfactory service and our staffs. We'll take it all to try our best to continue our services and we do look forward to welcoming you and your party again in the futuer

title: Andamen Embrace& Spa hotel(phuket)
review: We found checking in smooth, helped along with a welcome glass of punch. Check out wasn't so smooth and took about 25 minutes. Our airport transport was waiting. There are plenty of staff around and everyday hotel desk tasks seem to be mulled over, shared and eventually actioned ! Our first room for 8 days was with a balcony. Quite unnecessary as the rainy season restricted our usage of it. The air con was quite noisey, and hard to reset but very efficient. Internet connection quite patchy throughout the hotel but good at breakfast, probably because most people were eating! Different passwords throughout hotel. However, everything was completed which had to be. Our 2nd room didn't have a balcony so was larger as a result. This one had a bath, with stand in shower. The step over…

title: Thanks for a nice vacation at Andaman Embrace
review: I liked this hotel. We stayed for 11 day and 12 nigts there with our company for "corporate vacations". Everybody (there were 24 of us) was satisfied. The restaurant menu is tasty and different hot meals every day. What I liked more is the view from the restaurnat...eating on the terrace and enjoing views of beatiful garden with pond and small villas!!  But be ware of small birds (something like Thai ravens)) they can steal food if left on the table))) Once they aet my croissant ))) Nice staff and clean rooms. We had good service.

title: "Peaceful side of a party city"
review: It was our great pleasure welcoming you and your party on corporate vacation at our hotel recently.  We are delighted your party had experienced all satisfactory services especially the breakfast atmosphere surrounded by the beautiful garden. Thanks again for your stay and we look forward to welcoming you and your party again in the future.

title: Andaman Embrace Resort & Spa
review: Start from the beginning, there are plenty space for parking lot, the lobby is nice, high ceiling of Chino Portuguese. staff were very helpful when needed. We booked Andam Deluxe which is the hotel room is also nice with a balcony where u can see the ocean. its stunning.  The hotel provides a very rich Buffet style Breakfast....Lots of Choice at Breakfast. It is so Tasty and Great Food!  Highly Recommended This Hotel, BEST HOTEL in Patong Beach Phuket, Best Location close to the Beach, Excellent Quality Hotel and AMAZING POOL BEAUTIFUL. Our family were Very Happy, Impressed and Enjoyed stay this hotel, Definitely our family will come back to stay this hotel again!

title: Service,  what service?
review: It was our great pleasure serving you during your recent stay with the family at our hotel. We're also very glad to learn that you had experienced in all impressive services through your stay till departure. We'll take it all to try our best to continue our services and we do look forward to welcoming you and your family again in the future.

title: Pleasent and lovely pool
review: A good hotel, great location Excellent service! the staff  very Kind and  assistance any request! Specifically Fun  from the reception looked after throughout our stay any required! Thanks Fun!!!  Should improve the quality of signal of WiFi  Highly recommended!   Avi Chen

title: Disappointed
review: Have stayed at the andaman many times and has been a good place for several families to stay especially the cottages out of the way etc. but this time I should have done my homework as the hotel has sold off much of its charm and beach access to hotels..3 in fact this puts the andaman in a side street. The breakfast was very average and there is Construction so close to the back door of the cottages so no peace. The pool staff whist friendly did not have a stocked bar and needed to run back to hotel for drinks. The cottages are outdated and the bathrooms below average , sorry andaman but we will not be returning Soon. The hotel reception had limited English and seemed to cater to Asian travellers which was just as well and there were not mAny Aussies apart from our 11

title: Expectations of a "Resort & Spa"
review: Thank you very much for your informative review and comments. We also thank for your recent stay with us that helped us see what shall be done to meet more guest satisfaction. As we are friendly to everyone, we don't see any point to welcome only preferred nationalities. We firmly believe that other hotels are doing the same thing. On the other hand, the market situation gets changing and more Asian people are traveling to Thailand and Phuket. That's the reason why we have seen them around the areas.    Some inefficient staff services are of our serious concerns and we would surely take it into our priority review and improvement. Regarding the construction behind the hotel, we are very sorry but it is beyond our control. The fences, in fact, have been completely screened the site off and it is now under minimum noise disruption.  Regarding the general maintenance plan, we are actually refurbishing our facilities on the planned schedule. The bungalows are also one of the maintenance plans and will be conducted in an appropriate time and period.  Last but not least, we would like to express our sincere gratitude towards your valued comments and we do look forward to having an opportunity to welcome you again in the future.

title: Nice Hotel and Good Location
review: A hotel name with Resort & Spa in it, I expected a more resort feel, save for the swimming pool.  The cottages area was nice, with a resort feel, unfortunately is only a small area of the hotel and sadly not taken full advantage of.  You have to look around for it.  For what you pay I don't think there is much to complain.  The breakfast was buffet had a good spread both western and asian, and a good part of it is changed daily.  It was nice to be sitting in the spacious dining room at the edge near the garden. You will have some insects joining you, so have something handy to shoo them away.  Although the rooms can be in better condition. The hot water control was not consistent, be prepared to have cold and slight hot water coming out.  And be prepared to have your bathroom…

title: Great Location
review: First of all, many thanks for your valued reviews and the good advice on some of our services. It's worth taking into our concerns and see what we can do to meet WIN-WIN solution.   Unfortunately, the Spa is of the outsourced service and we don't think we could provide a free service except the discount on case by case.   The deposit for some incidentals upon check-in is very common practice for any hotel and is applied to all individuals or parties. A refund at a certain period of time is under the bank's policy and we get nothing to do about this.   Regarding to a charge of the extra key in case of loss, we would like to clarify that we do not want to make any profit on such case as you may see that it's just a minimum charge. Anything has a cost!.  We anyway really appreciate your valued comments and we are pretty sure that you have had a good memory and just need to see more possible improvement in some of our services.  Thanks again and we look forward to serving you again in the future.

title: Wonderful Stay
review: We had stayed in Andaman Embracce for 5 days 4 nights in early Jun 15, the room is big and clean enough, the staff in Andaman Embracce was friendly and helpful, they always be there to advise and assist you for any matter you are looking for. They have a good customer midset, Well Done! Wifi quite slow in my room, have to open the door and step outsisde to get the wife, but the wifi at the hotel lobby was fast enough, was highlited to the hotel staff but still not really solve it after they did something, but we don't mind as there is a business center room for the guest to use the computer with high speed internet. Breakfast in hotel was good and variety of food to choose for. We had enjoyed the stay in Andaman Embracce, we strong recommend all my friend and will book this…

title: Good Times Gone
review: This was our third stay at the Andaman, previous two when known as Club Andaman. What a difference a few years makes;- gardens sold off for other developments, pool area and facilities now a concrete edifice without soul, no evening entertainment at the Lobby Bar - I would not term the property a resort and spa, more a high priced B & B in a superb location. The facilities still exist to regenerate the property but it needs a mission statement and management interest and direction. Staff were most pleasant and helpful but it must be soul destroying to them to staff bars, etc. while residents headed elsewhere after breakfast. We had rented a Lotus Chalet for the period, required extensive renovation and definitely not the "luxury" cottage advertised. Bed linens excellent and…

title: superb location
review: We understood that you thought of your good times in the former period. Time changes, and we have been with the new hotel at the present. Your informative reviews are totally welcome. Thank you very much for your kind stay and we hope we have a chance to serve you again in the future.

title: Home away from Home!
review: definetly 1 of the best hotels in patong, 300 yards from the beach, away from all the hustle and bustle and still only 5 minutes walk to the centre of town, good selection for breakfast rooms with a balcony outstanding and the staff very helpful

title: Phuket Hotel in Patong
review: Your impressive reviews were very grateful and thankful. We would definitely try our best to continue good service and standard in order to meet more guest satisfaction and requirement. Thanks again for loving our great location and all other hotel facilities. We look forward to welcoming you back here again in the future.

title: Decent enough hotel at a good location
review: A most delightful stay and most helpful staff. My room was upgraded at no further cost upon check-in. The rooms are spacious, the linen crisp and clean. The bath-linens can do with a make-over . Disappointing was the breakfast. It lacked variety and creativity I thought!  My experience was made all the better by the Assistant Manager(Ms. Peenai). Extremely helpful!

title: Decent Hotel in a good location
review: Nice clean hotel ,Staff good,good location 200 yds from the beach,15 mins walk to Bangla Road, lovely pool, pool swim up bar , good sun loungers , Gym ok ,breakfast ok , restaurant food good,  spacious rooms,air con good, bath towels worn and thin,cosmopolitan customers, so be prepared for very noisy guests shouting to each other down the tiled corridors in the early hours, apart from that we would recommend it.

title: Terrible Service
review: Thank you very much for your recent stay with us. We are glad to learn that you mostly enjoyed our services and facilities. We shall definitely provide our valued guests with good services and do expect to meet more guest satisfaction and requirement. We look forward to welcoming you back here again in the future.

title: A smile, hello, good morning, welcome to Phuket.....Goes a long way
review: Stayed here for 5 nights with family and apart from the location and the garden near our cottage style room it is very hard to find any positives for this hotel. As previously posted by other guests, from the airport transfers, reception staff and breakfast dining staff, I do not believe we received a good morning or a smile from one staff member. My husband and I started to wonder if it was because we were Westerners as we noticed Asian clientele were treated better.  The cottage room size was of a good size but the decor, especially in the bathroom was very grubby, unclean and outdated. The pool area was quite nice but totally lacked atmosphere and is quite slippery to walk when the tiles are wet.  You only have one key for the cottage so if you go out your aircon goes off…

title: Patong Holiday
review: Your informative reviews were very grateful. We regret that our services did not meet your expectation. Of course, a retraining program is one of our most concerns and it shall be done as soon as possible. Thanks again for your valued comments. We hope we have a chance to serve you again in the future.

title: Nice Hotel, Great Location, Staff Difficult
review: I planned to stay at this hotel with my family for 5 nights There was 12 of us staying in different rooms around the hotel. When 5 of the family members were picked up at the airport using the hotel transport  I immediately thought I hope this is not going to be the picture for the rest of the holiday. The driver did not speak to us at all not even a welcome..a smile or how was your flight. When we got to the hotel the check in process was okay just a bit of confusion over the deposits for each room but that was sorted, just tired visitors and the lack of understanding of the english language which made them seem very unfriendly. No mention of "welcome or show of a smile" Our rooms were clean but when you use the shower it floods the whole floor all down to bad design. There was…

title: Beautiful resort right off the beach
review: The resort is great, continental breakfast was huge & tasty & the beach is right there. The pool was great, never too busy -- downside too many kids around. Were a young couple & there were just tons of families at this resort, therefore everything died down at 8pm!

title: Fantastic Location and Fabulous Hotel
review: Thank you very much for your kind recommendation on our hotel as well as thank you for your recent stay with us. On occasion of our traditional Thai New Year, "Songkran Festival", we wish you a good health and a happy life through the year to come.

title: Inflexible Staff and Management
review: The hotel is minutes from Patong Beach and Bangla Road is only about 10 mins walk away. It is located in a quiet off the main fareway street central but peacefull. Food was super, great choice and well presented.  Tip - get a boat from patong beach and ask to go to freedom beach takes 10 mins, cheap and its only accessible by boat totally unspoilt and beautifull!  Tip - Best Island visit was Ko Tachi its a bit away but paradise is hardly enough of a description.  Don't get duped by the guys on the mopeds in Patong saying you have won a top prize on a scratch card they give you - timeshare sharks! they are aplenty and relentless! just say no thanks mate!

title: There are better places Iam sure.
review: Many thanks for your impression on our hotel for your recent stay with us. It's greatly supporting us to continue our Andaman Embrace's service with full effort. On occasion of Songkran festival (water splashing), we do wish you good health and happy life! We look forward to welcoming you back here again in the future.

title: Strategic location
review: Total of 14 people of us went Phuket for holiday during March 2015 for 4D3N stay at Andaman Embrace. We made the 3 days staying into 3 booking as we do not want to have the breakfast for 3rd day. We had been asked to deposit 1000 baht per room per booking. We have 7 rooms, therefore we have to deposit 21000 baht. This is ridiculous. After a long argument on this deposit, the manager came and told us that we can just deposit 10000 baht for the 7 rooms and 3 nights staying.   Actually, we can just deposit 7000 baht for the 7 rooms instead of 10000 baht, which is 1000 baht per rooms. Due to 3 different booking, we have to deposit more. The management is inflexible at all.  As for the rooms, I have requested to have all 7 rooms in same level and near to each rooms, or even connected…

title: OK but could be better
review: Stayed here for two weeks in Feb.   Positives - Customer service was great, any problems were attended to straight away and the staff were very efficient.  Negatives - Asked to move floor due to day and night renovations which started a week into our stay. They moved us to a room that we were not happy with, broken blinds and curtain and dirt in the bath. We asked to move to another room  and that room was OK but there were dirt and stains everywhere. There were dark stains on the wall above the bed and dirt on the chairs inside the room, the bin, around the bath and tiles.  I understand the renovations which started at the beginning of March are to go on for a month so hopefully there are improvements.  I don't think I will be staying here again.

title: High Value and cheap
review: We are very sorry for the inconveniences during your recent stay. Anyway, our maintenance works were just the replacement of the bath tubs for only 10 rooms and all of them have been completely done. Thank you very much for your informative comments for our better improvement.

title: Great value for money
review: so far this hotel is so good , actually cheap from room rate, concep, location and any facility, close with patong beach, nice room and other facility like a grat pool outside, they have good view from inside hotel, so quite and comfortable..

title: Will pick another hotel if ...
review: It's great to learn that you liked our hotel especially the good view from the room as well as our reasonable price. If you plan for next stay in Patong please be noted that we are always waiting to welcome you back soon.

title: Average
review: Stayed a couple of nights earlier this week. Rooms were clean and modern enough. We had two rooms as part of our stay and one did smell a bit like cigarette smoke but we managed to air it out. The breakfast was good enough with everything you would expect and the staff were friendly. Couple of things to watch out for; the walls a paper thin so if you have a loud neighbour (which we did) be prepared to be woken up. Also it is close to the action of patong beach so there is plenty of action at night. Tip. Ask for a room without an adjoining room door, for some reason we had a room that had an adjoining room doorway and both nights at 3 am the neighbour tried to walk into our room and then proceeded to talk really loudly in another language before blasting the tv. I called the…

title: OK but not great
review: Have stayed at this hotel before the renovation and name change and was not to impressed. The rooms is big and have the most of what you need. The breakfast is oh with a good selections of food. The location is very good with short walk to the beach and to Bangla road. The pool is very good but it was better before when the garden was bigger. Now they have sold a part of the garden to Holiday inn Express. This takes the sea view from the lower rooms. Have asked for a room as high as possible but got a room in the 4th.floor with no sea view. We asked if we can have a room higher up and was promised a room in the 6th. floor 3 days later. They gave us the room number and we was very pleased. On the promised dated we went down to the reception and asked for the new room key but…

title: Good... But not great.
review: Thank you for your comments. Anyway, we would like to clarify our property. We are the new owner and got nothing concerned with the previous period. Our fourth floor is good enough for the good view. Thanks again and we look forward to welcoming you back in the future.

title: Very Good Option in Patong Beach
review: If we could give this place a three and a half we would, it was good however there was some definite downfalls. When first arriving we were welcomed and talked through all important information about the hotel and the area. After soon realising that we had left a mobile phone in the shuttle that picked us up from the airport we explained to the staff that we needed to call the company so that we could retrieve it, however after explaining the situation to several staff nothing had been done and they told us to wait for a phone call that never came. The room was nice, spacious and clean however we had troubles with the sliding door that opened up to the balcony as it whistled very loudly whenever there was a slight breeze. We also had troubles finding where the air conditioning…

title: Hotel just down the street from Patong beach
review: We are very sorry to hear that you had such an unpleasant experience on arrival. We do apologize for the inconvenience. Your comments were really informative and of great value. Anyway, we do hope to serve you again in the future.

title: Good value stay.. Top hotel ... Good area !
review: Room and Bathroom are imense! Great view of the pool and the sea.  Huge swimming pool. Excellent breakfast.  Location is perfect and quiet: 150 m from the beach and walking distance of all restaurants of Patong. But I recomend to rent a scooter (only if you have a license because you'll be stopped by policemen) and visit the south beaches: Yanui, Rawai, Leam ka Yai, Promthep Cape etc. Much more beautiful with much less people.

title: Everything was great except the recept staff
review: What i loved about the hotel:   -cheap and good accomodation -Great outdoor pool with a pool bar  -comfortable hotel rooms and beds -great location with a stretch of seafood stores nearby (for Halal and non halal) -about 5 mins short walk to patong beach  -There is even a counter near the reception for tourists who wish to book their tours around Phuket.   What i dislike:  -lousy key cards for the room. We changed twice and its still spoilt  -uninterested staff at the reception area who seems to hate their job ALOT. Felt very looked down by the staff when we were checking in. not sure why.   Overall, i feel that it was still a great stay albeit the grumpy staff.

title: Good hotel in great location
review: Your informative comments was really much appreciated. Thank you for all impressions with our hotel. Only thing that is of priority concerns we assure you of serious supervision and re-training program in particular to our reception staff in a prompt action. We wish to welcome you back here for your next visit to Phuket.

title: Do yourself a favour and stay somewhere else.
review: My first visit to this hotel, chosen mainly for the central location; 5 mins walk from Patong beach and 2 mins from the main road with many bars, restaurants and tourist shopping outlets.  I booked a deluxe double room with balcony which was very modern, stylish and clean. Unfortunately the Wi-Fi was very slow most of the time and frequently dropped out in both my room and pool-side. It was very annoying having to keep entering the user name and password.  Nice swimming pool with plenty of sun-beds available. Unfortunately, the rather loud musing playing in the poolside bar was very off-putting.

title: Thanks for the best holiday
review: Thank you very much for your recent stay with us. We are very glad our location and swimming pool met your expectation. Anything that should be done to serve more customer satisfaction will certainly be reviewed and implemented. We look forward to welcoming you back Andaman Embrace soon.

title: 3.5 star. New, Clean Rooms in a Good Location
review: A very very mixed bag with this hotel. I'll keep it straight and to the point though.   The good:   - Breakfast from 6:00 till around 10am, with quite a wide choice. Cereals, Various drinks, Eggs bacon etc etc and all you can eat.  - Wifi in room connects up relatively fast and speed is good.   - Pool is nice with a swim up bar. Also free towel rental at the pool and front desk.   - Rooms are quite new-ish.  That's about where it ends though..  The bad:  - We booked our room, a double, in August. Yes, 4/5 months in advance, only to be given a twin single upon arrival!? We arrived around 3 or 4 in the morning so we thought we'd leave it to the morning and after breakfast to sort out. It would have been nice if the staff told us when arrived about that..   - Next morning, we go to…

title: Andaman Hotel
review: I had a very enjoyable stay at this hotel. The breakfasts were superb and the hotel was close enough to all the major attractions but far enough away from all the hustle and bustle. I met Adison the General Manager and I found him to be a delightful man and very helpful.

title: good location, nice staff
review: Thank you very much for your recent stay with us. You certainly have our gratitude. We wish to welcome you back here again in the future.

title: Worst hotel!! Ever!!
review: Location is very good close to the beach and all main atarctions Rooms are very confortable  The only problem was witj WiFi, which were not stable and the music in the loby and the restaurant (for 3 days same two songs, all the time)

title: Located in Patong, clean is the highest remark we can give
review: We are very glad to learn that you like our location, room facilities and staff services. Your comments and recommendation are also worth our improvement. Thanks again for your recent stay with us and we are eager to welcome you back in the future.

title: New Years fiasco... and bad service
review: This is the worst hotel I've ever seen!! Front desk staff is the worst and charged me for other rooms. We were in rooms 706 (embrace suite) and 605. They charged me for 2 glasses which were missing from room 611 even after repeated arguing. Front desk even said they are recording my voice when I was arguing with them. Unbelievably unprofessional I've even seen! I would suggest none of my friends, relatives and tripadvisor friends ever stay at this hotel!!

title: Very Nice Hotel with Good Food
review: One of the best hotel in Phuket, visited in December first week. Very much near Patong beach.  Hotel is very nice n clean. View from hotel is very beautiful. I went for honeymoon & am very much satisfied. specially food, very nice buffet food. Staff is nice & helpful. all in all recommended.

title: Top hotel! Very welcoming.
review: We love to learn that your honeymoon trip was impressed with either food varieties or our staff services during stay with us in early December this year. Thank you for all good points of view. We'll keep up our good services and we look forward to joining your next honeymoon anniversary celebration at Andaman Embrace soon.

title: Good also bad
review: Stayed for 3 nights, rooms are very spacious and modern we had sea/pool view room. Wifi is good throughout the hotel can be abit dodgy around the pool. Pool is amazing and great swim up bar. Staff at this hotel will go the extra mile to help with anything. Beach is 5miniute walk from the hotel and Bangla road main nightlife/bars 10/15 miniute walk. Would defiantly stay again and recommend to anybody staying in patong.

title: One week of cool relaxation
review: We are so proud to learn that you loved our hotel either the room with sea/pool view or other facilities like the pool with the swim-up bar, short distance to the beach and shopping districts. Many thanks for impression with our services staff that will definitely be of a great support for us in  pursuit of excellent. We do look forward to welcoming you back Andaman Embrace soon.

title: Pleasant stay & nice services
review: Goood: 1. Room nice clean big (we had the pool view with balcony)   2. Breakfast has quite alot options for both western and asian (but not really that tasty like the other hotel i been they made less but delicious) so breakfast was kinda average for us. Nothing special.  3. Swimming pool is awesome.   4. Location 15mins walking to the beach. And walking to the bar street also not TOO far.   Badddddd: 5. Wifi is the worst. Terrible even than guesthouse i think! Our room couldnt get wifi or u just lost it every 5 mins then have to relog in again. If u need stable wifi u better sitting in the lobby not YOUR BEDROOM. We have complained abt it to the reception they couldnt fix it up. For such big hotel couldnt even offer a stable wifi. Disappointed.  Fully thing is the next door…

title: Enjoyable stay
review: I stayed here with my family and we have 2 young children (1&3) we were first put in a room on the second floor outside the lift and just above the reception. The room was good unfortunately it was to noisy, from people getting out of the lift and people arriving in the reception area. We advised the hotel who were very understanding and moved us to a different room on the 6th floor which was a lot quieter.   The best feature of the hotel is the pool which is big and has plenty of room to relax around. The kids play area was also handy and the gym also looks good.  Breakfast had lots of variety but no english breakfast foods such as bacon, sausage etc, one day they had baked beans but they were not there the next.   The beach is just a short walk away and there are plenty of…

title: Andaman embrace
review: We are very glad to hear that your family with the kids enjoyed stay at our hotel from the location, the pool, the gym and kids facilities to friendliness of our staff especially 'Fun' and some other services staff. For breakfast, we have actually provided the sausage everyday but we will certainly review the bacon that is actually available on request to be served as normal. We all look forward to welcoming your family back in the future.

title: Not a bad option, just not a great one
review: The Andaman Embrace was clean nice accommodation near to everything, the breakfast wasn't that good but passable, The water pipes into shower and bath need to be renewed as the water was always brownish which I didn't find anywhere else in Patong, they only supply 2 bottles of water complimentary so I suggest to management they supply extra water until pipes are fixed. Over pretty happy with the Andaman though.

title: Average
review: Thank you so much for your valued review especially on the water issue. Our booster pump was in fact temporarily malfunctioning and it has been now properly fixed. We are very sorry for the inconvenience.

title: Nice and decent Hotel
review: So you are looking for a resort in Patong with a lovely pool, great location and first class rooms, the Andaman Embrace report will give you two of these three....  Lets start with the positives, the location can't really be beat, a very short stroll to the beach, 5 mins walk to all the attractions that Patong offers and just far enough away from them that its nice and quiet at night.   The other big positive is the pool.   Just right temperature, clean and big enough that lots of people can be in there without falling over each other.   The pool side bar is fantastic, especially 4-6pm where the drinks are half price, always a great way to start the night...The other big plus for the hotel is the breakfast spread, its HUGE!  Lots of western and thai breakfast options, always…

title: great location
review: we stayed here for 7 nights and were very happy with this resort. The staff were very friendly and helped us book many of the attractions that were on offer. Great location, short walk to good restaurants and Bangla Road. Would happily stay here again

title: One of the most comfiest Hotels I've ever booked with
review: Thank you for choosing our hotel for your recent stay. We’re also happy to learn that you enjoyed your holiday at Andaman Embrace. We look forward to welcoming you back here again soon

title: Fairly good but I won't stay again
review: Bathroom could use a slight bit more effort cleaning up, but overall good.   Great service, friendly staff and I loved the food [Sweet pork with Shrimp Paste Rice was my favourite]. The Loykrathong Festivities were very fun.   I know where I'm staying when I come back to Phuket.  PS  Thanks for the Birthday Cake! Was a great surprise!

title: Great hotel in good location
review: Our Embrace team is really glad to hear that you had enjoyed your stay as well as loved our surprise birthday cake and Loy Krathong night. We all can’t wait to welcome you back for your next plan of stay in Phuket. Have a wonderful day and thanks again for your recent stay.

title: Great place to stay and I'll be back!
review: I stayed in the last week of october just before high season, so I was happy to have good prices (about 2,000 THB a night) and the hotel almost empty. The location is ok, but if you go to Bangla/Jung Ceylon you will end up walking an extra 10min all the time which can be annoying. The staff was not always that friendly, even rude sometimes. I had wifi issues in my room and they failed repairing it so upgraded me to another room which was nice. I don't like their bathtub as you can't stay on the edges because it is curved, so you end up being in the middle for taking a shower which is not very convenient (you'll understand when you see it!).  The water coming from the tap was very often yellow which is disgusting... I think they are filtering themselves their water but that could…

title: Our favourite hotel in 6 months travelling!
review: We came here a few days before to check this hotel out as our parents were coming to meet us for 10 days in patong. The staff were so polite and showed us the rooms and around the hotel so we decided to book it! They even saved the rooms they had shown us for our stay! Our parents arrived and loved it! The pool is very relaxing and a great temperature to swim in! The breakfast was lovely with a good selection. It's very close to everything situated pretty much on the beach and all the shops and restaurants are a 2 minute walk!   All in all we have absolutely loved this hotel and have had some brilliant memories with our family so we thank all the staff and hope to return again if we get the chance!   Emma and Freddie!

title: Returned to see the changes
review: We would like to express our sincere appreciation for your recent visit with your family at Andaman Embrace. We’re also so proud of being one of your most favorite places in Patong especially our prime location to the beach and all surrounding areas. Our staff and management are eager to serve you and your family again for your next visit plan to Phuket.

title: Musty
review: We stayed at the Andaman for 3 years in a row before the renovations and wanted to return to see the changes.  Was pleasantly surprised at the difference but must admit that we missed the beautiful gardens.  The room was large, clean and bright with the usual lovely balcony overlooking the amazing new pool.  My partner & I are more of beach people, but do like sitting on the balcony with a drink.  Unfortunately, I cannot remember the names of the staff but they were all wonderful and friendly, especially the young man who picked us up from the airport.  They were always willing to assist and talk to you.  There was always a friendly smile when you left or returned to the Hotel.  Received a free drink voucher on arrival.  Breakfast was excellent.  Something for everyone.   I…

title: Fantastic
review: It was our great pleasure welcoming you back as one of our beloved family members. We’re also very glad to hear that all our facilities especially our hotel’s driver and other staff at Andaman Embrace completely satisfied you and your party. Thank you very much and we do look forward to welcoming you and your party back here again soon.

title: POOR client service and assistance
review: Arrived at nearly midnight, was taken to our cottage/bungalow and instantly hit by the musty smell inside. I'd been suffering from bad allergies, so we went back to the front desk to see if we could get a different room, but was told that all the bungalows have the same musty smell, so they would just spray something in the room (which did cover it up for a couple days). Complained again, was offered a "deluxe" balcony room up in the main tower. It too was musty, and smaller. Went back to complain that it was a downgrade from what we paid for, but was told it was the same price (lie). Went back to the original bungalow room to pull up the reservation website to show the prices to the front desk, but the internet was pitifully slow and impossible to pull up a single web page (it…

title: Poorly Manage
review: I was there on the 29 Aug with Families. I book two Balcony Deluxe room and one Deluxe room. I was given with no choice a Embrace Suite and one Balcony Deluxe. Due that the hotel is running full. Sounds good right but that no the point. We have 5 Adults and only one toilet in the Suite. The point is I want two Balcony Deluxe room that has two toilet. The staff was not able to handle this situation. When the Asst. Sale Manager came a plead with me. Hope they know the hospitality business as I will not go there again.

title: The hotel's lovely - just stay away from anything edible.
review: We are terribly sorry for being unable to serve your expectation but we had tried our hard effort to get the best solution with some hospitality offers. Anyway, we’ll take all of your comments for our better improvement.

title: Short Stay but was Wonderful
review: The hotel is lovely! The location is on the other non-crowded side of patong beach; ask for a sea-view room and preferably on the 5th or 6th Floor. The pool is lovely - temperature controlled with access to a bar - even better! The breakfast spread if questionable - certain things were spoiled and smelled funny. The watermelon was spoiled on a couple of occasions and so were the eggs.    The food (room service and dine-in) was awful. DO NOT order food from them. The food is horribly stale and my entire family (including me) had a bad case of food poisoning on our flight home.

title: Not recommended
review: Thank you very much for your informative comments . We are very sorry to hear that your family  had  a bad experience in our food service. Some point of view will certainly be discussed for our better improvement but we need it clear if the food quality was up to standard.

title: Worth it
review: First of all a huge thanks goes to Adison, who unlike most General Managers actually takes the time to fix anything he can that is wrong or not working in the hotel- many of these reviews I would assume they did not go and say anything to the lovely people on the front desk- sorry I have stayed so many places and forgotten their names- but I think it was Po? Checking in was nice and smooth and took about 5 mins which is always good if you have had a long flight or just want to go relax. I got a free room upgrade- as mentioned from others they will do this if they have the rooms available, and the location is in a quieter part of Patong which is good if you don't want to hear music until 3am, the beach is about a 5 min walk and bangla rd is about 10mins. I can only say positive…

title: andaman embrace
review: what a resort the andaman embrace is only two years old , clean fresh friendly, quick check in. the staff were something else so so friendly. and so close to the beach and the  seafood restaurants,so cheap we will return. thank you again..

title: Great
review: Many thanks for all good reviews. It’s such a great encouragement for us to keep improving our good standard and services. We certainly look forward to welcoming you back soon.

title: Worth your Money
review: Very good location 100 ms from beach and many restaurants around and a lot of facilities. nice pool and big rooms. Clean and nice staff. Internet slow, and you have too reconnect every 10 minutes.  You have to go up big ramp or many stairs.

title: Relaxing holiday in Phuket
review: Thank you very much for your recent stay with us and especially your informative comments for our better improvement. We do wish to welcome you back here soon.

title: Poor breakfast selection & housekeeping
review: Nice clean hotel with every thing required already present inside the room.Washrooms were clean and service was excellent. Located at a peaceful road with just a 2-3 mins walk to Bangla street and to the main Bazaars

title: Amazing stay in Patong
review: I stayed here for three nights and absolutely loved this place! The staff were incredibly friendly and were always smiling. The location is great as it's only a 10 minute walk to Bangla Road and the heart of Patong. The rooms are spacious and clean and the breakfast every morning was amazing. The pool bar was an absolute highlight of the hotel and the bar staff working there are the friendliest people! I would definitely stay here again.

title: One of best
review: We’re all glad to learn that you absolutely had a pleasant stay with us. Many thanks for all what you liked as it’s definitely a good moral support for us to continue our best effort in the excellent services. We look forward to welcoming you back again in the future.

title: Good choice at Patong
review: The first advantage is the location. just 5mins to heart of Patong Beach. That the best part of this hotel. The hotel ambiance is quite good with lot of green. But its fully booked most of the times and crowded. For example the pools are quite crowded. The hotel premises is quite vast.  Service wise its a mixed response, but nothing major to complained about. The rooms are acceptably good and cleanliness could be improved. We did not try the food there since we wanted to enjoy the road side and authentic food. Overall this offers quite a value for a memorable vacation.

title: Good choice at Patong
review: Your review was truly useful and informative. It’s also good for us to keep promoting our hotel for public awareness. Thank you very much and we look forward to serving you again in the future.

title: Great value, clean & beautiful hotel
review: Good location, in the south part of Patong beach, yet quiet and just a 5 minute walk to the heart of Patong, which is alive mostly at night. When you ask the reception staff for anything their first reaction is always like as if they hear such question for the first time of their life, even when you are asking about things they have to come across daily. I highly recommend speaking to Ms. Pop from reservations and Ms. Pat, who is the front office manager, they are both very helpful. Breakfast is delicious, it doesn't change much, but since we stayed only for 4 nights, it was ok - there is also choice of Thai food which we liked. Free parking is a plus. Our bath tub had was leaking so after a shower there was a flood in the bathroom. There was no ventilation in the bathroom so it…

title: Rude Front Desk Staff
review: It's a mixed review Customer-Service wise. I had a very bad experience with the front desk staff, but the guy in the lobby who assisted us with the transportation was very nice. The front desk lady was rude, impatient, and ignorant. One of them even raised her voice to me just because I requested to speak with somebody else who could speak better English. Room wise, most were newly renovated but you could still tell that everything is low quality. Location wise it was ok. It is in Patong but if you're coming here for the actual Bangla-road action, it's still quite a walk there. It is quite close to the beach, but the beach there is overcrowded and unpleasant. Overall, I didn't have a good stay here.

title: Nice location!!
review: We’re terribly sorry for your dissatisfied experience at the front desk. We’ll look into this matter seriously and find the best way to prevent it happening again. Thanks for all valued comments and we wish to have a chance to serve you again the future.

title: Young, Wild, Free
review: This was our first trip to Thailand and we stayed in this hotel for three nights. No doubt hotel is big in structure and location is convenient to the main Patong beach and other market stuff. Rooms were spacious but there was some drainage problem in our room bathroom and moreover room was very humid. We checked-in in late evening and I found staff not much friendly at the reception. I would say breakfast was good upto my expectations.

title: Again, AWESOME!
review: Thank you for your valued comments. We’ll keep up our good standards and try our best to improve the services as suggested. If you plan for next stay please bear us in your mind. We do wish to serve both of you in the near future.

title: Great stay, location and friendly staff
review: First trip to Thailand, staying at this establishment in Patong Beach. -very conveniently situated -clean and spacious rooms with nice finishes -prompt and thorough housekeeping -safe and secure -very polite and helpful hotel staff -gorgeous pool!

title: Comfortable Stay
review: Hotel staffs speak fluent English with warm attitude, they've taken good care of our luggage while we checked in early. The room interior is perfect with warm beige and white design, instantly made us feel relaxing and soothing. Bed linen is clean, super soft and comfy. Swimming pool is awesome, only down side was we found some dirts on the pool during our swim which was a bit unpleasant. However we did see some staffs doing some cleaning the next morning. Overall we had an enjoyable stay, would definitely come back to stay again in future!

title: Fantastic!
review: It’s our great pleasure learning you enjoyed your holiday at our Andaman Embrace and would be back here again in the future. We’ll try our best to give you the double deluxe room with the bath tub for your next stay. Thank you very much for all valued comments.

title: Good location, Spacious and clean rooms.
review: Room looked very spacious, thanks to its all-white interiors. It actually was spacious too. Everything was clean but I noticed the sheets had a running hole and some pen marks. Please change those!  Bathroom just the perfect size. Only problem was the shower - it suddenly runs very hot and then cold from time to time, even if you have the right temp 'mixed' already. Some teeny tiny details like excess paint on glass windows in the bathroom need to be fixed. They need to get new shower curtains too as ours had a bit of mildew embedded in it and was discolored.   Nice big pool!   Breakfast was great, though they hardly changed the continental lineup. Thai breakfast was delicious.   Location - it's right behind Hioliday Inn Express so that means it's also in the quieter area of…

title: Adaman Embrace - Revisted
review: Thank you very much for your valued comments that are good enough for us to pursue the continual improvement. Our room facilities have been being kept up to meet customer satisfaction. Please let us know if you plan your next holidays in Phuket. All of us are awaiting you here…at Andaman Embrace.

title: Good hotel, Great breakfast
review: I stayed in this hotel for nearly 4 days in November 2012 along with my husband and kid. The location of the hotel was very convenient and close to the Patong Beach. The room was clean and spacious with nice decor, facing the pool. Spread of items on Breakfast table was good and elaborate, even though they didn't have any Indian dishes in the breakfast. Staff were courteous and very helpful and arranged for a cab for airport transfer. They even helped us in booking the sails and tours for the Phi-Phi island. There is a children play room also. I loved my stay in this hotel and would recommend it to others also.

title: Safe and clean with a nice pool
review: I think this hotel is used a lot by the airlines as there were always air crew in the reception areas either arriving or departing. The rooms are spacious and adequate with free wifi with is nice. The food appeared expensive for where you are and much cheaper and more authentic in the myriad of restaurants nearby. The pool area is nice and served by a swim up bar, you can order coffees and snacks and smoothies from around the pool but again pricey. If you visit Bangla road, and you must, just turn right out of the hotel and right again at the main road and walk for about 10 mins past restaurants, fish stalls, veg stalls etc it will be on your right. Or turn left out of the hotel and left at the main road, walk along the beachfront with various restaurants for 10 mins and it will…

title: Spacious room, big pool but.....
review: Thank you very much for your informative comments. We do love your direction guide about our hotel surroundings that really makes sense to facilitate all customers getting to know better about our hotel.

title: No English Tourists
review: After staying at Holiday Inn Express Patong for 3 nights, we tried another hotel because we saw the beautiful façade, spacious sunbathing area and the big pool with nice garden   so we decided to book at the  Andaman Embrace Resort and Spa last February 22 to 24 . There are many choices for breakfast but the different kinds of dishes are so-so...Also , the lady cooking the omelette  was rude.The omelette that I got , the egg was not cooked so I told her to cook again, she frowned and murmured in thai , got the omelette and threw it in the wastebasket. She took another omelette from the chafing dish , put in the frying pan and pour a lot of cooking oil.Instead of showing my irritation I just turned my back  and went to my table.  We were given a room without balcony.The room is…

title: Great Location.. great hotel...
review: We are very sorry for your dissatisfaction experience in the breakfast service. The staff attitude is assured of a serious concern and review for a better improvement. Thank you so much for your comments and we look forward to having a chance to serve you and your family again.

title: Good location, nice rooms, awesome pool
review: We were the only English at this hotel,the rest were Russians and Chinese. It was a clean hotel but it was more room only as all the food for breakfast was always cold, even when I asked for fresh hot egg and bacon they warmed up the old bacon and brought it back COLD for the last 7 days I had coffee and orange juice for breakfast. Evening meals were ok and reasonably priced. The staff were always smiling and polite and found that I tipped the cleaners on the 1st day and they really looked after us..Would I go back again? NO

title: Jules & Pat .... Lovely Hotel ....
review: we stayed at the Andaman Embrace for 9 days in Janurary 2014. it was our first time to patong beach and I have to say that it was a lovely hotel. The photos you see on the website is what you get rooms were lovely and cleaned every day, staff were very helpful, the buffet breakfast had a lot to choose from you can either eat breakfast inside or outside, pool area always clean, wifi worked beautifully and very quite. We liked the fact that patong beach 2mins down the road. Bungla Rd was only a 10 to 15 min walk. We will recommend this hotel to all of our friends...... 9 days was not enough there is just so much to do and see .. Thankyou for a lovely stay....

title: Amazing resort in Patong Beach
review: We’re so glad to be part of your enjoyable holiday with your family at our hotel. It encourages us to strive for excellence as much as we can. Thank you very much for your recent visit and we look forward to welcoming you and your family back here again in the future.

title: We enjoyed it  a lot....
review: I recently spent 6 nights at this hotel in Patong beach, Phuket and didn’t want to leave! It’s a wonderful hotel; the staff are so warm and hospitable. Every staff member was smiling; it makes such a difference to the environment. The pool is lush, has a bar and plays fun music. The breakfast is delicious, buffet with hot and cold options and tasty fresh fruit every morning. The restaurant that serves breakfast has a beautiful view of the garden and cottages that are dotted at the back of the hotel. Our rooms were clean, spacious with comfortable beds and we had a view of the beach and hills surrounding Patong. There is a canopy style lounge near the pool where guests can relax. The hotel is a 10 minute walk to Kalim beach and 15 minute walk to Patong beach, so it’s conveniently…

title: Lovely hotel....
review: Lots of thanks for calling us ,‘Amazing Resort in Patong Beach’. We may take this name to apply for the word-of-mouth marketing. Thanks again for choosing our hotel for your perfect holidays with your family in Phuket. We’re all here eager to serve you and your family again soon.

title: New and spacious
review: We stayed at Andaman Embrace on our honeymoon... we have choosen the hotel for being a 4* hotel near the sea... and the room was having a sea view... The room was great furnished with beautiful simple modern furniture.. the stuff their were very helpfull... they even adviced us to take the pool towels and use them at the sea... The breakfast there was very delicous... and we recommed that u reserve it with breakfast... to enjoy the outdoor brakfast... near the gardens... The pool bar was excellent too... and they do good cocktels.... as you will find many places in thailand many bars and cheap I  prices  but bad quality and not tasty...  Conceerning the location... it is 5 min walk from the beach... and 15 min walk from tje center of patong wherd there is all the activities....…

title: Nice but not that nice after all
review: We went with 27 people with 11 rooms. Everybody had their own problem with their room. From screwed up air con system to leaking bath tub. The location is nice, the hotel is big. Buffet breakfast is nothing great, the chef is cooking almost the same thing everyday.

title: A Quiet 3-Star Hotel near Patong Beach
review: First of all, we would like to thank for a recent stay with your party at our hotel. We also would like to share some idea that the air-con and leaking problem just had in some room and had been fixed properly.

title: excellent hotel location in Patong!
review: We stayed here for 1 night which we found it to be an average hotel  Pros: - Good and quiet location near Patong beach (10min) and Jungceylon mall is 20-30 min walking distance - Room is clean - Free wifi but slow speed - Pool was average - Check-in and out was ok  Cons: - Beds are a bit small and toilet is small - Shower is weak and water is yellow - Small, no toys, and no staff in the Kid’s Club - The breakfast was average with few selections

title: Wonderful hotel
review: We do welcome all your comments that will help us review what we can do to improve our services. For this, we have a few points to share and update that is the Internet speed and the water condition. Our WiFi connection is possible to be slow during the peak hour Internet usage but the router in room is simply available on request. Our water condition is hardly happened to be a problem but we are very pleased to trace back.

title: Good location, great staff.
review: perfectly located in Patong area, not too noisy! Our room has an amazing view! they have wide variety of breakfast buffet! beach area is also steps away. perfect for families and couples! highly recommended!

title: Quiet Hotel in Happening Place, Close to the Beach
review: We had a pleasant stay at this hotel for four nights.  It has a beautiful pool, gym, bar, and restaurant.  It is so huge, that sometimes you feel you are only one staying in it. :-) Close to the beach, one block away from the hustle bustle of Patong beach and two blocks away from Bangla road.  Great breakfast buffet spread.  There are many money exchange, thai massage shops and restaurants close to the hotel.
